analyzed: tan dang rnam par dag pas bshad pa ste go sla'o //
translated: The four verses beginning with “the inner stages, etc.” and the two verses beginning with “the four,” the two lines, and the two verses explain the abode, costume, reality, qualities, and purity of the deities generated, which are easy to understand.

original: bskyed rim gyi zhen pa spangs pa'i phyir rdzogs rim la 'jug pa'i yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor bstan pa ste /
analyzed: bskyed rim gyi zhen pa spangs pa'i phyir rdzogs rim la 'jug pa'i yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor bstan pa ste /
translated: In order to abandon attachment to the creation stage, the six-branched yoga for entering the completion stage is taught.

original: 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms nas /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms nas /
translated: By this, having meditated on the wheel,

original: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //🔽zhes pa ni sems dpa' sum brtsegs dang ; / ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa dang sku gsung thugs dang skye mched phyin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba ste /
analyzed: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur // zhes pa ni sems dpa' sum brtsegs dang ; / ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa dang sku gsung thugs dang skye mched phyin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba ste /
translated: one will quickly attain power.

original: reg pa'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
analyzed: reg pa'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
translated: This teaches the yoga of contact: the three nested beings, summoning the gnosis wheel, empowering the body, speech, mind, and sense bases, conferring empowerment, offering, praising, and tasting elixir.

original: de la sems gzung ba ni grangs la bslab pa dang / dbyibs la bslab pa dang / kha dog la bslab pa dang phyag mtshan dang rgyan dang cha lugs kyi bar du sems gzung ngo //
analyzed: de la sems gzung ba ni grangs la bslab pa dang / dbyibs la bslab pa dang / kha dog la bslab pa dang phyag mtshan dang rgyan dang cha lugs kyi bar du sems gzung ngo //
translated: In that regard, holding the mind is holding the mind to the number, holding the mind to the shape, holding the mind to the color, and holding the mind to the hand implements, ornaments, and costume.

original: phra mo la bslab pa ni /
analyzed: phra mo la bslab pa ni /
translated: The training in the subtle is as follows:

original: dang po nag po rab tu bsgom //
analyzed: dang po nag po rab tu bsgom //
translated: First, meditate on black.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ni snying gar h'um nag po gcig /🔽dmar po ni mgrin par a'am ngo //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ni snying gar h'um nag po gcig / dmar po ni mgrin par a'am ngo //
translated: A black hūṃ is at the heart.🔽A red aṃ is at the throat.

original: ser po ni dpral bar dzr'im ngo //🔽ljang gu ni lte bar kham ngo //
analyzed: ser po ni dpral bar dzr'im ngo // ljang gu ni lte bar kham ngo //
translated: A yellow jrīṃ is at the forehead.🔽A green kṣaṃ is at the navel.

original: sngon po ni na mtshong du h'um ngo //
analyzed: sngon po ni na mtshong du h'um ngo //
translated: A blue hūṃ is at the perineum.

original: dkar po ni spyi bor bhr'um mo //
analyzed: dkar po ni spyi bor bhr'um mo //
translated: A white bhrūṃ is at the crown.

original: de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi ngo bo yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug pa'i yan lag tu dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog rim pa drug tu yang bsgom ste rags pa lha'i zhen pa spong ngo //
analyzed: de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi ngo bo yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug pa'i yan lag tu dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog rim pa drug tu yang bsgom ste rags pa lha'i zhen pa spong ngo //
translated: Those are also meditated on as the colors of the maṇḍala in six stages for the purpose of entering the stage of completion, the nature of the six tathāgatas.

original: rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa drug tu rgyas gdab pa'o ;
analyzed: rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa drug tu rgyas gdab pa'o ;
translated: The seal of the six tathāgatas is the nature.

original: / dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: / dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of the culmination of the separation from joy.

original: zhes pa ni zab pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa ste 'og nas rgyas par 'chad do //
analyzed: zhes pa ni zab pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa ste 'og nas rgyas par 'chad do //
translated: This is the teaching of the profound yoga, which will be explained in detail below.

original: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig dang tshig rkang gcig dang shugs kyis bstan pa gcig gis ni sdud par byed pa'i mtshams sbyor ba ni gang zhig cho ga'i yan lag gis lha bsgom pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig dang tshig rkang gcig dang shugs kyis bstan pa gcig gis ni sdud par byed pa'i mtshams sbyor ba ni gang zhig cho ga'i yan lag gis lha bsgom pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Now, in order to explain the stage of completion, one verse, one line, and one implication teach the connection of the summary. The branch of the rite, the meditation on the deity, is the stage of generation.

original: ye shes mngon du skye ba'i thabs ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes mngon du skye ba'i thabs ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The means of producing manifest wisdom is the stage of completion.

original: yang na rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rten du gyur pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pa byin gyis rlob pas kyang mtshan te /
analyzed: yang na rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rten du gyur pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pa byin gyis rlob pas kyang mtshan te /
translated: Or, it is characterized by being the basis of the stage of completion and by blessing the stage of generation.

original: bskyed pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pas rdzogs @271a * //
analyzed: bskyed pa dang bskyed pa'i rim pas rdzogs @271a * //
translated: The generation and the stage of generation are the completion and the stage of completion.

original: pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni mos pa'i rnal 'byor nas mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du rim pa kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa ni bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni mos pa'i rnal 'byor nas mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du rim pa kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa ni bskyod pa'o //
translated: The color and shape aspects of the stages, from the yoga of imagination up to manifest enlightenment, are the generation.

original: las kyi phyag rgya nas phyag rgya chen po'i bar du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya nas phyag rgya chen po'i bar du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The perfection stage is from the karma consort up to the great seal.

original: ye shes dngos su shar ba ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes dngos su shar ba ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The perfection is the direct arising of pristine awareness.

original: de dag ni de kho na nyid ni sgyu ma rnam dag dang rang bzhin rnam dag go //
analyzed: de dag ni de kho na nyid ni sgyu ma rnam dag dang rang bzhin rnam dag go //
translated: Those are the purities of illusion and natural purity.

original: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the creation stage in that way,

original: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bshad pa ni /
analyzed: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bshad pa ni /
translated: now, in order to explain the perfection stage,

original: nam mkha'i khams ni la sogs pa sngar gyi sdom du bstan pa'i don go rims bzhin du bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni la sogs pa sngar gyi sdom du bstan pa'i don go rims bzhin du bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: the meaning of the previously stated summary “the realm of space” and so on is explained in order.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i don gnyis te /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i don gnyis te /
translated: The meaning of connate is twofold:

original: shes par bya ba dbye ba'i sgo nas shes pa dang / bskyed thabs kyi rim pa'i nyams su blangs pas shes pa'o //
analyzed: shes par bya ba dbye ba'i sgo nas shes pa dang / bskyed thabs kyi rim pa'i nyams su blangs pas shes pa'o //
translated: connate that is known by means of divisions and connate that is known by means of practice of the method of generation.

original: dbye ba la mtshon bya dang mtshon byed kyis dbye ba dang / ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas dbye ba dang / rten gyi sgo nas dbye ba dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo nas dbye ba'o //
analyzed: dbye ba la mtshon bya dang mtshon byed kyis dbye ba dang / ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas dbye ba dang / rten gyi sgo nas dbye ba dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo nas dbye ba'o //
translated: The divisions are the connate that is known by means of divisions, the connate that is known by means of the essence, the connate that is known by means of the support, and the connate that is known by means of the presentation.

original: dang po la drug ste /
analyzed: dang po la drug ste /
translated: The first has six topics.

original: mtshon bya don dam bde ba 'khor lo'i tshul du bde ba dang mngon sum du ste gsang ba'i dbang por skyes pa'o //🔽kun rdzob der khu ba thig le tshogs pa gcig pa'i tshul du ste /
analyzed: mtshon bya don dam bde ba 'khor lo'i tshul du bde ba dang mngon sum du ste gsang ba'i dbang por skyes pa'o // kun rdzob der khu ba thig le tshogs pa gcig pa'i tshul du ste /
translated: The ultimate meaning to be illustrated is the bliss of the wheel of the bhaga, which is born in the secret organ.

original: gzugs dang ro lta bur bu ram dpe ltar skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang ro lta bur bu ram dpe ltar skyes pa'o //
translated: The relative is the collection of the bindu of the seminal drop, which is born in the form of the union of the two, like form and taste, like the example of molasses.

original: mtshon byed dbyer med pa ni rang rig pa des don rang gi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste dper na sprin gyis zla ba khebs pa de'i mthong nas snang ba ltar brgyud nas phyag rgya chen po las shes par byed do //
analyzed: mtshon byed dbyer med pa ni rang rig pa des don rang gi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste dper na sprin gyis zla ba khebs pa de'i mthong nas snang ba ltar brgyud nas phyag rgya chen po las shes par byed do //
translated: The illustration of the inseparability of those two is the self-knowing that engages the meaning of its own characteristics. For example, after the moon is covered by clouds, it is seen as if it were shining.

original: mtshon bya'i dbang du byas pa kun rdzob lha ste /
analyzed: mtshon bya'i dbang du byas pa kun rdzob lha ste /
translated: The relative deity is from the perspective of the illustration.

original: khu ba lus las byung ba gnas pa dang don dam de'i bde ba dmyal ba yan chad la yod pa'i byang chub sems de don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: khu ba lus las byung ba gnas pa dang don dam de'i bde ba dmyal ba yan chad la yod pa'i byang chub sems de don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: The ultimate is the bliss of the seminal drop that arises from the body and exists in the hell realm and above.

original: dbyer med sems rang rig pa bde ba la mi rtog pa ste de ltar drug go //
analyzed: dbyer med sems rang rig pa bde ba la mi rtog pa ste de ltar drug go //
translated: The inseparability of those two is the nonconceptual bliss of the self-knowing mind.

original: de nyid mtshan nyid kyis dbye ba na gnyis te //
analyzed: de nyid mtshan nyid kyis dbye ba na gnyis te //
translated: When that is divided by way of its characteristics, there are two:

original: kun rdzob dang don dam mo //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam mo //
translated: the conventional and the ultimate.

original: de la mtshon byed ril kun rdzob /
analyzed: de la mtshon byed ril kun rdzob /
translated: In that regard, all that is indicated is conventional;

original: mtshon bya ril don dam mo //
analyzed: mtshon bya ril don dam mo //
translated: all that is indicated is ultimate.

original: rten gyi sgo nas dbye ba la bzhi ste /
analyzed: rten gyi sgo nas dbye ba la bzhi ste /
translated: The division by way of the basis is fourfold:

original: shes rab bud med la gnyis /
analyzed: shes rab bud med la gnyis /
translated: the wisdom woman is twofold;

original: thabs skyes bu la yang gnyis te don dam dang kun rdzob gnyis te bzhi'o //
analyzed: thabs skyes bu la yang gnyis te don dam dang kun rdzob gnyis te bzhi'o //
translated: the method man is also twofold, making four: the ultimate and the conventional.

original: rnam par gzhag pa la bzhi ste dga' ba bzhi la lhan skyes su byas te /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa la bzhi ste dga' ba bzhi la lhan skyes su byas te /
translated: The division by way of the arrangement is fourfold: the four joys are taken as being connate.

original: skad cig bzhi ni spangs pa'i tshul dang / dga' ba bzhi thob pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: skad cig bzhi ni spangs pa'i tshul dang / dga' ba bzhi thob pa'i tshul lo //
translated: The four moments are the way of abandoning and the way of attaining the four joys.

original: bskyed thabs ni slob dpon gyi man ngag gis dbang gsum pa bstan pas @271b rtogs pa gcod pa ste /
analyzed: bskyed thabs ni slob dpon gyi man ngag gis dbang gsum pa bstan pas @271b rtogs pa gcod pa ste /
translated: The method of generating is the way of cutting off realizations by the master’s intimate instructions in the explanation of the third empowerment.

original: bde ba mngon sum du 'byung /
analyzed: bde ba mngon sum du 'byung /
translated: Bliss arises in actuality.

original: mi rtog pa rjes su dpag pa'i tshul du skye'o //
analyzed: mi rtog pa rjes su dpag pa'i tshul du skye'o //
translated: Nonconceptuality arises in the manner of inference.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni padma la //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni padma la //
translated: The space element is the lotus.

original: zhes pa ni shes rab kyi gsang ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni shes rab kyi gsang ba'i gnas so //
translated: This is the secret place of the wisdom [consort].

original: bha ga zhes pa'ang ye shes brjod //
analyzed: bha ga zhes pa'ang ye shes brjod //
translated: The bhaga is also said to be gnosis.

original: ces pa ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: ces pa ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i gnas so //
translated: This is the secret place of the method.

original: snyoms 'jug ni aom padma su kha la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms 'jug ni aom padma su kha la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Union is endowed with the Dharma of consecration with “oṃ, you are the lotus vagina,” and so on.

original: bde ba ni mtshon byed don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba ni mtshon byed don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: Bliss is the ultimate simultaneously born object of expression.

original: 'khor lo ni gcod cing sbyong bas shes rab stong pa nyid zur la skye'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni gcod cing sbyong bas shes rab stong pa nyid zur la skye'o //
translated: The wheel is the emptiness of wisdom that arises in the corner of the cut and polished.

original: sngon 'gro zhes pa zhu ba ni man ngag gi shugs kyis bstan pa ste mtshon byed kun rdzob lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: sngon 'gro zhes pa zhu ba ni man ngag gi shugs kyis bstan pa ste mtshon byed kun rdzob lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: The request “Please explain” is the relative simultaneously born object of expression that is taught by the power of intimate instructions.

original: rigs pa ji bzhin rang rig ni mtshon byed dbyer med rang rig gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rigs pa ji bzhin rang rig ni mtshon byed dbyer med rang rig gsal ba'o //
translated: “Self-knowing awareness, just as it is” is the clear, self-knowing, indivisible object of expression.

original: lha byang chub sems ni mtshon bya don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: lha byang chub sems ni mtshon bya don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: “Bodhicitta of the deity” is the ultimate simultaneously born object of expression.

original: ji ltar 'byung ba zhu ba ni mtshon bya kun rdzob lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'byung ba zhu ba ni mtshon bya kun rdzob lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: “How does it arise?” is the relative simultaneously born object of expression.

original: lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis ni gnyis med de mtshon bya lhan skyes so //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis ni gnyis med de mtshon bya lhan skyes so //
translated: The two types of simultaneously born are nondual.

original: de dag ni gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa'o //
translated: Those are the intimate instructions of the wisdom of another’s body.

original: yang na nam mkha'i padma ni lte ba'i padma stong pa'o //
analyzed: yang na nam mkha'i padma ni lte ba'i padma stong pa'o //
translated: Or, the sky-lotus is the empty navel-lotus.

original: bha ga'i ye shes ni ye shes kyi skal pa dang ldan pas bha ga ste bde chen gyi gnas so //
analyzed: bha ga'i ye shes ni ye shes kyi skal pa dang ldan pas bha ga ste bde chen gyi gnas so //
translated: The bhaga-wisdom is the bhaga, the place of great bliss, because it is endowed with the good fortune of wisdom.

original: sgom pa snyoms 'jug ni 'og dang steng du 'od zer dang / thig le'i tshul du rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: sgom pa snyoms 'jug ni 'og dang steng du 'od zer dang / thig le'i tshul du rgyu ba'o //
translated: The meditation-equipoise is the movement of light rays and drops in the lower and upper [channels].

original: de'i bde ba ni 'khor lo bzhi'i lam nas so //
analyzed: de'i bde ba ni 'khor lo bzhi'i lam nas so //
translated: Its bliss is through the path of the four wheels.

original: sngon 'gro zhu ba ni rten sngon du 'gro ba'i zhu bas so //
analyzed: sngon 'gro zhu ba ni rten sngon du 'gro ba'i zhu bas so //
translated: The preliminary melting is the melting through the preliminary support.

original: ji ltar rigs par rang rig ni brten pa'i chos bde ba rang rig tu nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rigs par rang rig ni brten pa'i chos bde ba rang rig tu nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: Self-awareness as appropriate is the experience of the bliss of the supported phenomena as self-awareness.

original: lha byang chub sems ni ma zhen par rnam par rol pa'o //
analyzed: lha byang chub sems ni ma zhen par rnam par rol pa'o //
translated: The bodhicitta of the deity is the non-attached play.

original: zhu ba ni yang rten sngon du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: zhu ba ni yang rten sngon du 'gro ba'o //
translated: The melting is again the preliminary support.

original: lhan skyes rnams gnyis ni gnyis med do //
analyzed: lhan skyes rnams gnyis ni gnyis med do //
translated: The two co-emergences are non-dual.

original: de dag ni mtshon bya mtshon byed du lhan cig skyes pa yang snga ma ltar bshad do //
analyzed: de dag ni mtshon bya mtshon byed du lhan cig skyes pa yang snga ma ltar bshad do //
translated: Those are also explained as the co-emergence of the illustrated and the illustrator as before.

original: de ni rang lus thabs la brten pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rang lus thabs la brten pa'o //
translated: That is the reliance on the method of one's own body.

original: brten pa chos nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni nam mkha'i khams ni padma zhes pa shes rab kyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: brten pa chos nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni nam mkha'i khams ni padma zhes pa shes rab kyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'o //
translated: The “great seal” that is the support of the Dharma is the space element, the lotus, which is the realization of the emptiness of all phenomena of wisdom.

original: bha ga ni thabs snang ba sgom pa'o ;
analyzed: bha ga ni thabs snang ba sgom pa'o ;
translated: The bhaga is the cultivation of the appearance of the method.

original: / de gnyis kyis 'khor lo de gtsod cing sbyong bar byed do //
analyzed: / de gnyis kyis 'khor lo de gtsod cing sbyong bar byed do //
translated: Those two fill and purify the wheel.

original: de kho na byang chub kyi sems mos pa tsam du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na byang chub kyi sems mos pa tsam du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: That is the reality, which should be cultivated as mere devotion to the bodhicitta.

original: yang nam mkha'i khams ni padma'i skud pa dang 'dra bas na khong stong phyag rgya chen po'i rten no //
analyzed: yang nam mkha'i khams ni padma'i skud pa dang 'dra bas na khong stong phyag rgya chen po'i rten no //
translated: Moreover, since the space element is like the lotus fiber, it is the support of the empty great seal.

original: bha ga ye shes ni der ye shes rang 'bar ba'o //🔽sgom pa snyoms @272a * //
analyzed: bha ga ye shes ni der ye shes rang 'bar ba'o // sgom pa snyoms @272a * //
translated: The bhaga is the gnosis that is the self-arisen gnosis there.

original: 'jug ni dbang po dang ba'i thabs so //
analyzed: 'jug ni dbang po dang ba'i thabs so //
translated: Cultivation is the method of the union.

original: de'i bde ba ni thabs so //
analyzed: de'i bde ba ni thabs so //
translated: Its bliss is the method.

original: 'khor lo ni shes rab po //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni shes rab po //
translated: The wheel is wisdom.

original: sngon 'gro zhu ba ni de'i rten no //
analyzed: sngon 'gro zhu ba ni de'i rten no //
translated: The melting of the preliminaries is its support.

original: rig pa rang rig ni dbyer med do //
analyzed: rig pa rang rig ni dbyer med do //
translated: The self-awareness of vidyā is the indivisible.

original: byang chub sems ni mtshon bya shes rab po //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni mtshon bya shes rab po //
translated: Bodhicitta is the wisdom that is the object of illustration.

original: lha rnams ni thabs so //
analyzed: lha rnams ni thabs so //
translated: The deities are the method.

original: 'byung ba zhu ba ni mtshon bya'i rten no //
analyzed: 'byung ba zhu ba ni mtshon bya'i rten no //
translated: The melting of the elements is the basis of what is to be illustrated.

original: lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis ni mtshon bya dbyer med do //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis ni mtshon bya dbyer med do //
translated: The two kinds of connate are the indivisible object of illustration.

original: phyag rgya chen po la ji ltar mtshon bya mtshon byed du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la ji ltar mtshon bya mtshon byed du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is the great seal illustrated as the object of illustration?

original: bla ma'i man ngag gi stobs sam /
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag gi stobs sam /
translated: It is the strength of the guru’s instruction.

original: phyag rgya chen po dbang bskur gyi khu ba'i thig le kun rdzob /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po dbang bskur gyi khu ba'i thig le kun rdzob /
translated: The relative is the bindu of the bodhicitta of the great seal empowerment.

original: bde ba don dam rang rig dbyer med /
analyzed: bde ba don dam rang rig dbyer med /
translated: The ultimate is the bliss of self-awareness.

original: mtshon bya ni rten dbang po khyad par can 'ja' tshon lta bu'i thig le ni kun rdzob /
analyzed: mtshon bya ni rten dbang po khyad par can 'ja' tshon lta bu'i thig le ni kun rdzob /
translated: The object of illustration is the relative, the special sense organ, the bindu that is like a rainbow.

original: zag pa med pa'i bde ba don dam /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i bde ba don dam /
translated: The ultimate is the immaculate bliss.

original: rang rig mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa gsum dang bral ba dbyer med pa rang 'byung gi ye shes so //
analyzed: rang rig mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa gsum dang bral ba dbyer med pa rang 'byung gi ye shes so //
translated: The indivisible object of illustration and illustration is the self-originated pristine consciousness that is free from the three characteristics and endowed with the three.

original: bshad pa de rnams ni skabs 'dir lhan cig skyes pa gtan la dbab par yang 'gro'o //
analyzed: bshad pa de rnams ni skabs 'dir lhan cig skyes pa gtan la dbab par yang 'gro'o //
translated: All of those explanations are also included in the connate determination in this section.

original: sgom par yang 'gro ste sngon du 'gro ba dang / rtags rnams snga ma bzhin du sbyor ro //
analyzed: sgom par yang 'gro ste sngon du 'gro ba dang / rtags rnams snga ma bzhin du sbyor ro //
translated: It also goes to meditation, with the preliminaries and the signs as before.

original: de ni dbye ba'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni dbye ba'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the presentation of the divisions,

original: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te go sla'o //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te go sla'o //
translated: there are two verses, which are easy to understand.

original: de nyid phyir na zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid phyir na zhes pa ni /
translated: Therefore,

original: lhan cig skyes pa dbye ba'i phyir //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa dbye ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to divide the connate,

original: dga' ba bzhi yi rab dbye ba //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi yi rab dbye ba //
translated: the divisions of the four joys🔽are taught.

original: zhes pa ni dga' ba la yang bzhir dbye ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dga' ba la yang bzhir dbye ba'o //
translated: There are four divisions of joy.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because of the side of the completion stage,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs las zhes pa ste de'i dbang du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs las zhes pa ste de'i dbang du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is, because of being under its influence.🔽Thus,

original: 'di ltar / lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa bzhi //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar / lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa bzhi // zhes pa ni /
translated: the connate is of four types.

original: lhan cig skyes pa dang dga' ba ngo sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa dang dga' ba ngo sbyar ba'o //
translated: The connate is connected with joy.

original: de dag ji ltar zhe na //
analyzed: de dag ji ltar zhe na //
translated: How is that?

original: dga' ba las ni dang po'o //
analyzed: dga' ba las ni dang po'o //
translated: The first is from joy.

original: dpa' bo nyid ni skyes bu thabs kyi lhan skyes so //
analyzed: dpa' bo nyid ni skyes bu thabs kyi lhan skyes so //
translated: The connate of the method is the hero, the person.

original: mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second is supreme joy.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i btsun mo shes rab kyi lhan skyes so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i btsun mo shes rab kyi lhan skyes so //
translated: The queen of yoginis is the innate wisdom.

original: shin tu bde dga' ni dga' bral gyi gsum pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu bde dga' ni dga' bral gyi gsum pa'o //
translated: The supreme bliss is the third of the three of the separation from joy.

original: thams cad des ni kun rdzob mtshon byed lhan skyes so //
analyzed: thams cad des ni kun rdzob mtshon byed lhan skyes so //
translated: All of that is the innate that is the conventional, the means of expression.

original: de bde thabs las ni dga' bas lhan skyes te bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de bde thabs las ni dga' bas lhan skyes te bzhi pa'o //
translated: From the method of that bliss is the innate of joy, the fourth.

original: thams cad rig ni don dam pa'am mtshon bya lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad rig ni don dam pa'am mtshon bya lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: All of that is the innate that is the ultimate, the object of expression.

original: da ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bsgom bya'i rim pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyis bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bsgom bya'i rim pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyis bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the stages of the innate meditation by means of the states of cause and effect, it is said:

original: dga' ba bde ba cung zad de /
analyzed: dga' ba bde ba cung zad de /
translated: Joy is a slight bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba rang gi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because bliss is not the nature of itself.

original: mchog dga' @272b lhag ma ni shes pa rang rig gi mtshan nyid la sgro btags pa'o //
analyzed: mchog dga' @272b lhag ma ni shes pa rang rig gi mtshan nyid la sgro btags pa'o //
translated: The supreme joy is the remainder, which is the superimposition on the nature of the self-knowing awareness.

original: dga' bral chags bral ni gnyug ma las nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dga' bral chags bral ni gnyug ma las nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The separation from joy is the separation from passion, because it is a degeneration from the natural state.

original: lhag ma ni yongs su lhag ma ste de gsum char gyi rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: lhag ma ni yongs su lhag ma ste de gsum char gyi rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pas so //
translated: The remainder is the remainder of the complete, because it possesses the supreme aspect of all three.

original: yang dang po reg par 'dod pa ni rten shes rab ma ste gnyug ma yul du byas pas so ;
analyzed: yang dang po reg par 'dod pa ni rten shes rab ma ste gnyug ma yul du byas pas so ;
translated: Again, the first, desire for contact, is the support, the wisdom consort, because the innate is taken as the object.

original: / gnyis pa bde ba 'dod pa ni yid kyi yul la tshim pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / gnyis pa bde ba 'dod pa ni yid kyi yul la tshim pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The second, desire for bliss, is because there is no satisfaction with the object of the mind.

original: 'dod chags 'jig pa yang gnyug ma las nyams pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags 'jig pa yang gnyug ma las nyams pa'o //
translated: The destruction of desire is the degeneration of the innate.

original: bzhi pa bsgom pa ni dga' ba gsum gyi rnam pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ror byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzhi pa bsgom pa ni dga' ba gsum gyi rnam pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ror byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The fourth, meditation, is because the innate is taken as the taste of the three joys.

original: rang gi rgyu dang gzhan gyi rkyen gyi 'bras bu skyon dang yon tan cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu dang gzhan gyi rkyen gyi 'bras bu skyon dang yon tan cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What are the faults and qualities of the result of one’s own cause and the condition of another?

original: mchog dga' srid pa zhes pa ni zhen cing chags pa'o //
analyzed: mchog dga' srid pa zhes pa ni zhen cing chags pa'o //
translated: Supreme joy is existence, which is attachment and clinging.

original: dga' bral mya ngan ni nyan thos lta bu'o //
analyzed: dga' bral mya ngan ni nyan thos lta bu'o //
translated: Joyless sorrow is like the śrāvakas.

original: dbu ma dga' ba ni btang snyoms kyi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: dbu ma dga' ba ni btang snyoms kyi 'bras bu'o //
translated: The joy of the middle is the result of equanimity.

original: lhan cig skyes pa 'di dag spangs pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa 'di dag spangs pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Abandoning these four innate joys is because the nonabiding nirvāṇa is attained.

original: 'o na lhan cig skyes pa ci zhe na ;
analyzed: 'o na lhan cig skyes pa ci zhe na ;
translated: Well then, what is the innate?

original: /'dod chags med cing gnyug ma'i mtshan nyid grub pa ste /
analyzed: /'dod chags med cing gnyug ma'i mtshan nyid grub pa ste /
translated: It is free from attachment and is established as the innate characteristic.

original: mchog dga' ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: mchog dga' ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: Supreme joy is nonconceptuality.

original: chags bral med pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid las ma nyams pa ste /
analyzed: chags bral med pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid las ma nyams pa ste /
translated: Absence of separation is not degenerating from one’s own characteristic.

original: dga' bral du mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: dga' bral du mi rtog pa'o //
translated: Separation from joy is nonconceptuality.

original: dbus mar mi dmigs pa ni bde ba btang snyoms su mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: dbus mar mi dmigs pa ni bde ba btang snyoms su mi gnas pa ste /
translated: Nonapprehending a middle is not remaining in the equanimity of bliss.

original: dga' bral mi rtog pa'o ;
analyzed: dga' bral mi rtog pa'o ;
translated: Separation from joy is nonconceptuality.

original: / de dag ni rang gi rgyu'o //
analyzed: / de dag ni rang gi rgyu'o //
translated: Those are the causes.

original: 'di la ni lhan skyes so //
analyzed: 'di la ni lhan skyes so //
translated: This is connate.

original: thabs ni skyes bu'i byed pa'i mchog dga'o //
analyzed: thabs ni skyes bu'i byed pa'i mchog dga'o //
translated: The method is the supreme activity of the person, supreme joy.

original: shes rab ni btsun mo'i bya ba dga' bral lo //
analyzed: shes rab ni btsun mo'i bya ba dga' bral lo //
translated: Wisdom is the activity of the queen, separation from joy.

original: de gnyis ka'i dga' ba ste dga' bral lo //
analyzed: de gnyis ka'i dga' ba ste dga' bral lo //
translated: The joy of both is separation from joy.

original: yang dag de nyid snang ba ni 'bras bu 'khor ba dang zhi ba dbyer med pa'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag de nyid snang ba ni 'bras bu 'khor ba dang zhi ba dbyer med pa'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: The appearance of that true reality is the result, nonabiding nirvāṇa, the inseparability of samsara and nirvana.

original: 'o na lhan cig skyes pa de rgyud la ji ltar skye zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na lhan cig skyes pa de rgyud la ji ltar skye zhe na /
translated: Well then, how is that connate joy generated in the mindstream?

original: bden te mnyam pa'am lta ba'i ro mnyam pa de /
analyzed: bden te mnyam pa'am lta ba'i ro mnyam pa de /
translated: That is true. The equal taste of the view is

original: shugs la ro mnyam bsgoms pas bde ba mngon sum du skye ste /
analyzed: shugs la ro mnyam bsgoms pas bde ba mngon sum du skye ste /
translated: Bliss arises manifestly by meditating on the equal taste implicitly.

original: gzhan gyis brjod min zhes pa ni lung dang bla mas so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis brjod min zhes pa ni lung dang bla mas so //
translated: “Not expressed by another” means by scripture and the guru.

original: gang du mi rnyed pa ni chos gang la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gang du mi rnyed pa ni chos gang la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: “Not found anywhere” means not dwelling on any phenomenon.

original: 'on kyang bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas te phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag las so //
analyzed: 'on kyang bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas te phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag las so //
translated: Nevertheless, by relying on the guru’s timely methods, the intimate instructions of mahāmudrā.

original: bdag gi bsod nams zhes pa ni rang gi nang nas snang ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi bsod nams zhes pa ni rang gi nang nas snang ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: “One’s own merit” is the blessing that appears from within oneself.

original: da ni dbang po rang snang gi man ngag bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni dbang po rang snang gi man ngag bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the intimate instruction of the self-appearance of the sense organs,

original: dman dang 'bring la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstan pa dang / tshigs @273a * //
analyzed: dman dang 'bring la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstan pa dang / tshigs @273a * //
translated: there is one verse that explains the inferior, medium, and so on, and

original: su bcad pa gsum gyis bshad pa ste /🔽dman pa ni ngan pa'am phra ba yang na rags pa dang phra ba 'bring bo /
analyzed: su bcad pa gsum gyis bshad pa ste / dman pa ni ngan pa'am phra ba yang na rags pa dang phra ba 'bring bo /
translated: there are three verses that explain the intimate instructions.

original: mchog ni bzang ba'am rags pa /
analyzed: mchog ni bzang ba'am rags pa /
translated: The inferior is bad or subtle; the medium is coarse and subtle; and the supreme is good or coarse.

original: 'bring ni gnyis ka ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'bring ni gnyis ka ma yin pa'o //
translated: The medium is neither of those two.

original: yang ltos nas gsum du bshad do //
analyzed: yang ltos nas gsum du bshad do //
translated: Again, they are explained as three in dependence.

original: sgra yang snyan pa dang mi snyan pa gnyis ka la brten pa'o //
analyzed: sgra yang snyan pa dang mi snyan pa gnyis ka la brten pa'o //
translated: Sound is also based on both pleasant and unpleasant.

original: de bzhin du dri ro reg bya la yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dri ro reg bya la yang sbyar ro //
translated: Smell, taste, and touch are also to be applied in the same way.

original: de yang tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis ni lta ba bdag med par bshad la /
analyzed: de yang tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis ni lta ba bdag med par bshad la /
translated: Moreover, in the first verse and a half, the view of selflessness is explained.

original: yang tshigs su bcad pa gcig dang tshig rkang pa gcig gis ni sgom pa bde ba'i rnam pa bshad do //
analyzed: yang tshigs su bcad pa gcig dang tshig rkang pa gcig gis ni sgom pa bde ba'i rnam pa bshad do //
translated: Then, in one verse and one line, the meditation of the aspect of bliss is explained.

original: don 'di yis ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: don 'di yis ni brjod par bya //
translated: This is the meaning to be expressed.

original: zhes pa ni de dag gis bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de dag gis bsdus pa ste /
translated: This is the summary of those.

original: chos kun dbang po rang snang du byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshe lta ba spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / sgom pa rang gi mtshan nyid du gyur ba'o //
analyzed: chos kun dbang po rang snang du byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshe lta ba spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / sgom pa rang gi mtshan nyid du gyur ba'o //
translated: When all phenomena are empowered as the self-appearance of the sense organs, the view becomes the general characteristic and the meditation becomes the specific characteristic.

original: da ni che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa las /
analyzed: da ni che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa las /
translated: Now, in order to explain the greatness of the self, two verses are stated.

original: gcig gis ni shes bya lhan cig skyes pa'i yon tan yin la /
analyzed: gcig gis ni shes bya lhan cig skyes pa'i yon tan yin la /
translated: In one, the object of knowledge is the innate quality.

original: yang gcig gis ni nyams su blangs pa'i yon tan no //
analyzed: yang gcig gis ni nyams su blangs pa'i yon tan no //
translated: In the other, the quality of practice.

original: da ni spyod lam dang bsre ba'i man ngag bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni spyod lam dang bsre ba'i man ngag bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the intimate instruction for mixing with daily activities,

original: tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste /
translated: there is one verse:

original: de yang go rim sa bcung zad dkrugs nas phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pa ni sngar bzhin du man ngag shes pas so //
analyzed: de yang go rim sa bcung zad dkrugs nas phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pa ni sngar bzhin du man ngag shes pas so //
translated: Moreover, having slightly mixed up the sequence, one who desires the great seal should know the intimate instruction as before.

original: bza' btung ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'o //
analyzed: bza' btung ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'o //
translated: Food and drink are the connate taste.

original: khrus ni dbang du mos pa'o //🔽sad pa ni thabs kyis so //
analyzed: khrus ni dbang du mos pa'o // sad pa ni thabs kyis so //
translated: Washing is devotion to the empowerment.🔽Awakening is by the method.

original: nyal ba ni thabs kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: nyal ba ni thabs kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: Sleeping is the equipoise by the method.

original: des na sngon du 'gro ba ni rdzogs rim lhag par mos pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: des na sngon du 'gro ba ni rdzogs rim lhag par mos pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the prerequisite is the uninterrupted devotion to the completion stage.

original: da ni sgom pa bstan pa'i phyir yid kyis mi bsgom pa ni spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ni sgom pa bstan pa'i phyir yid kyis mi bsgom pa ni spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Now, in order to teach the meditation, since the mind is not meditated, it is not an object.

original: chu 'dzin nam mkha' dang 'dra ba yul med pa 'di yang ste de yang 'bring pa'i thabs kyis bya'o //
analyzed: chu 'dzin nam mkha' dang 'dra ba yul med pa 'di yang ste de yang 'bring pa'i thabs kyis bya'o //
translated: This is also like a cloud in the sky, without an object.

original: de nas phyag rgya chen po bsgom ste /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya chen po bsgom ste /
translated: Then, meditate on the great seal.

original: yid dangs pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yid dangs pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not merely the mere clarity of the mind.

original: 'gro ba thams cad bsgom pa ni lus can thams cad la phyag rgya chen po ldan pas so //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad bsgom pa ni lus can thams cad la phyag rgya chen po ldan pas so //
translated: The meditation on all beings is because all embodied beings possess the great seal.

original: thams cad chos ni yongs shes ni der zag pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad chos ni yongs shes ni der zag pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The complete knowledge of all phenomena is because only the undefiled appears there.

original: de bsdu ba'i phyir sgom du med pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa mdun na gnas pas so //
analyzed: de bsdu ba'i phyir sgom du med pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa mdun na gnas pas so //
translated: In order to include that, the nonmeditation is because conceptualization is present in front.

original: sgom pa po ni ye shes chen po rgyab na gnas pa ste /
analyzed: sgom pa po ni ye shes chen po rgyab na gnas pa ste /
translated: The meditator is the great wisdom that is present in the back.

original: de dag ni bde ba chen po bsgom pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: de dag ni bde ba chen po bsgom pa'i thabs so //
translated: Those are the methods for meditating on great bliss.

original: da ni shes pa bdag med par bstan pa'i phyir brtan @273b g-yo'i dngos po ni kun gzhir gyur pa'o //
analyzed: da ni shes pa bdag med par bstan pa'i phyir brtan @273b g-yo'i dngos po ni kun gzhir gyur pa'o //
translated: Now, in order to teach that consciousness is selfless, the entities of the animate and inanimate worlds are the all-base.

original: rtsa lcug la sogs pa ni der gnas pa'i chos can de bde bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa lcug la sogs pa ni der gnas pa'i chos can de bde bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: The phenomena that abide there, such as sprouts and so on, are illustrated by bliss.

original: bdag gi rang bzhin las ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bdag gi rang bzhin las ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the self is the nature of connate bliss.

original: dam pa de nyid ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dam pa de nyid ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: The supreme is applied to undefiled bliss.

original: des sgom ni bla ma brgyud pa'am nyams su myong ba gcig pa'o //
analyzed: des sgom ni bla ma brgyud pa'am nyams su myong ba gcig pa'o //
translated: Meditation is the lineage of gurus or the experience of one.

original: de rnams ni sngar gyi chos can de rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams ni sngar gyi chos can de rnams so //
translated: Those are the aforementioned phenomena.

original: gcig nyid ni bde ba'i ros so //
analyzed: gcig nyid ni bde ba'i ros so //
translated: One is the taste of bliss.

original: gzhan yod min ni sna tshogs med cing stong par byas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yod min ni sna tshogs med cing stong par byas pa'o //
translated: The nonexistence of other is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of diversity.🔽Now, in order to teach the result of inseparability, there are three🔽verses.

original: da ni dbyer med kyi 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir tshig rkang gsum ste rang rig bde chen ni rang rig thabs bsdus pa'o //🔽rang rig byang chub ni shes pas bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: da ni dbyer med kyi 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir tshig rkang gsum ste rang rig bde chen ni rang rig thabs bsdus pa'o // rang rig byang chub ni shes pas bsdu ba'o //
translated: One's vidyā is the method of great bliss.

original: rang rig phyir na bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: rang rig phyir na bsgom pa ni /
translated: One's vidyā is the bodhicitta that is the essence of the mind.

original: dbyer med pa'i phyir de kho na bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i phyir de kho na bsgom pa'o //
translated: Since one's vidyā is indivisible, it is meditated on.

original: da ni lta ba mngon rtogs kyang bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni lta ba mngon rtogs kyang bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the view and realization,

original: rang gi rig pa ni gnyug ma'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi rig pa ni gnyug ma'i rang bzhin no //
translated: one's vidyā is the intrinsic mode of being.

original: 'gyur ba ni tha mal gyi gnas skabs so //
analyzed: 'gyur ba ni tha mal gyi gnas skabs so //
translated: Change is the ordinary state.

original: dman pa mi brtag pa ni gnas skabs kyi mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: dman pa mi brtag pa ni gnas skabs kyi mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: The nonexistence of the inferior is the clinging to the state.

original: las ni brtag pa ste dge ba dang mi dge ba'o //
analyzed: las ni brtag pa ste dge ba dang mi dge ba'o //
translated: Karma is the investigation of virtue and nonvirtue.

original: 'phro ba'am sdud pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: 'phro ba'am sdud pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
translated: Its dispersion and reabsorption are suffering.

original: dbye ba ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: dbye ba ni bde ba'o //
translated: Its differentiation is happiness.

original: rang rig ni gnyug ma de nyid do //
analyzed: rang rig ni gnyug ma de nyid do //
translated: Self-awareness is the intrinsic reality.

original: de'i phyir rang rig gnyug ma de nyid ni de'i gnas skabs kun du 'gyur bas rgyal po dang gtso bo lta bu rgyu bar byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rig gnyug ma de nyid ni de'i gnas skabs kun du 'gyur bas rgyal po dang gtso bo lta bu rgyu bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, self-awareness, the intrinsic reality, is the king and the principal, which moves by means of all its states.

original: 'o na rang rig pa gnyug ma'i chos de dang / dman pa glo bur ba gnyis tha dad dam tha mi dad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na rang rig pa gnyug ma'i chos de dang / dman pa glo bur ba gnyis tha dad dam tha mi dad ce na /
translated: Now, is that intrinsic reality of self-awareness different or non-different from the inferior adventitious reality?

original: tha dad na 'gran thub pas ji ltar spang du btub /🔽tha mi dad na ni 'o na rnam par dag pa'i chos su 'gyur ram /
analyzed: tha dad na 'gran thub pas ji ltar spang du btub / tha mi dad na ni 'o na rnam par dag pa'i chos su 'gyur ram /
translated: If it is different, then since it can be opposed, how can it be abandoned?

original: dri ma'i chos su 'gyur /
analyzed: dri ma'i chos su 'gyur /
translated: If it is non-different, then is it the reality of purification or the reality of defilement?

original: rnam par dag pa'i chos su 'gyur na ni 'bad pa med par grol bar 'gyur te ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i chos su 'gyur na ni 'bad pa med par grol bar 'gyur te ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is the reality of purification, then one would be liberated without effort, because it is pure by nature.

original: ma dag pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur na ni 'bad pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma dag pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur na ni 'bad pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
translated: If it is the nature of impurity, then effort would be fruitless,

original: ngo bo nyid ma dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ma dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impure by nature.

original: dper na sol ba bdar kyang dkar po mi 'ong ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sol ba bdar kyang dkar po mi 'ong ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, even if you try to make charcoal white, it will not become white.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: And it is said:

original: gal te rnam dag de ma gyur //
analyzed: gal te rnam dag de ma gyur //
translated: If that were not purified,

original: 'bad pas 'bras bu med par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'bad pas 'bras bu med par 'gyur //
translated: then effort would be fruitless.

original: gal te nyon mongs de ma 'gyur //
analyzed: gal te nyon mongs de ma 'gyur //
translated: If the afflictions were not transformed,

original: 'bad pa med par grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'bad pa med par grol bar 'gyur //
translated: then there would be liberation without effort.

original: zhes zer ba la de ni de ltar mi lta ste /
analyzed: zhes zer ba la de ni de ltar mi lta ste /
translated: We do not see it that way.

original: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dang dri ma glo bur gnyis gcig pa dang tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dang dri ma glo bur gnyis gcig pa dang tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: The naturally pure and the adventitious defilements are not the same and not different.

original: de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med pa yin pas snga ma'i skyon mi 'ong la /
analyzed: de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med pa yin pas snga ma'i skyon mi 'ong la /
translated: Since they are inexpressible as the same or different, the previous error does not arise.

original: @274a * // rang bzhin rnam par dag pa yin pas 'bad pa don med par yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: @274a * // rang bzhin rnam par dag pa yin pas 'bad pa don med par yang mi 'gyur /
translated: And since it is naturally pure, effort is not meaningless.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: And it is said:

original: rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam par dag / dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam par dag / dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba //
translated: Naturally pure, the defilements are adventitious.🔽And:

original: gzhan yang / chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin //🔽dag pa nyid pas dag par 'dod //
analyzed: gzhan yang / chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin // dag pa nyid pas dag par 'dod //
translated: Like the water element, gold, and space,

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: they are held to be pure because of purity.

original: 'on kyang dri ma glo bur ba yin pas sna tshogs pa'i rtog pa mi 'jug la /
analyzed: 'on kyang dri ma glo bur ba yin pas sna tshogs pa'i rtog pa mi 'jug la /
translated: However, since the stains are adventitious, the various thoughts do not enter.

original: glo bur tsam spang pa'i thabs ni dgos te /
analyzed: glo bur tsam spang pa'i thabs ni dgos te /
translated: The method of abandoning the mere adventitious is necessary.🔽As it is said below:

original: 'og nas / bzhin lag kha dog gnas pa ni //
analyzed: 'og nas / bzhin lag kha dog gnas pa ni //
translated: The color of the face and hands

original: bskyed pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas //
analyzed: bskyed pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas //
translated: is established by mere generation.

original: 'on kyang bag chags phal bas so //
analyzed: 'on kyang bag chags phal bas so //
translated: However, it is by the habitual tendencies.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das ;🔽/ zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das ; / zhes gsungs so //
translated: By nature, there is nirvana.

original: da ni gnyis med rang rig tu bstan nas bde ba chen po bstan pa'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lnga'i bde ba ni mtshon byed lhan cig skyes pa las kyi phyag rgyal yod pa'o //
analyzed: da ni gnyis med rang rig tu bstan nas bde ba chen po bstan pa'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lnga'i bde ba ni mtshon byed lhan cig skyes pa las kyi phyag rgyal yod pa'o //
translated: Now, in order to teach great bliss after teaching nondual self-awareness, the bliss of the five afflictions such as desire exists in the illustrative connate karma consort.

original: de nas nyams dga' zhes bya ba ni mtshon bya ste phyag rgya chen po la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de nas nyams dga' zhes bya ba ni mtshon bya ste phyag rgya chen po la gnas pa'o //
translated: Then, “delight” is the illustrated, abiding in the great seal.

original: bcu drug cha ni zla ba bcu drug pa tshes gcig dang / gnyis la sogs pas mi bskrun pa'am /
analyzed: bcu drug cha ni zla ba bcu drug pa tshes gcig dang / gnyis la sogs pas mi bskrun pa'am /
translated: The sixteenth part is not produced by the first, second, and so on of the sixteen parts of the moon.

original: yang na nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i dga' ba bcu drug bsdus pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i lhan skyes te re re'i chas mi phod do //
analyzed: yang na nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i dga' ba bcu drug bsdus pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i lhan skyes te re re'i chas mi phod do //
translated: Or else, the sixteen joys that are included in the joys that are accompanied by afflictions are the connate of mahāmudrā, but each one of them is not suitable.

original: da ni rang rig mi rtog pa dang bcas pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: da ni rang rig mi rtog pa dang bcas pa ci zhe na /
translated: Now, what is one’s mind and nonconceptuality?

original: de yang yid kyi rgyu ba nyon mongs pa dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: de yang yid kyi rgyu ba nyon mongs pa dang bral ba ste /
translated: That is also free from the movement of the mind and afflictions.

original: de nyid kyi shugs gyis bstan to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi shugs gyis bstan to //
translated: That is indicated by the force of that.

original: da ni dbyer med de bshad pa'i phyir chos 'byung ni shes rab lha mo bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: da ni dbyer med de bshad pa'i phyir chos 'byung ni shes rab lha mo bla na med pa'o //
translated: Now, in order to explain their inseparability, the source of phenomena is the unsurpassed goddess of wisdom.

original: ye shes skyes pa ni deng ye shes rang 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes skyes pa ni deng ye shes rang 'bar ba'o //
translated: The arising of gnosis is the self-arisen gnosis of the present.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mkha' ma nyam ste mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' ma nyam ste mi rtog pa'o //
translated: It is “space-like,” that is, nonconceptual.

original: thabs ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: thabs ni bde ba'o //
translated: The method is bliss.

original: lhan cig skyes pa ni ro gcig pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa ni ro gcig pa'o //
translated: The connate is of one taste.

original: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of method and wisdom

original: ro gcig pa de las so //
analyzed: ro gcig pa de las so //
translated: is of one taste.🔽From that, the three worlds🔽are born.

original: 'jig rten gsum po ni dag dang ma dag pa'i chas khams gsum mam sku gsum mo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po ni dag dang ma dag pa'i chas khams gsum mam sku gsum mo //
translated: The three worlds are the three realms or the three kāyas, in terms of pure and impure aspects.

original: de las skyes ni lhan cig skyes pa las so //
analyzed: de las skyes ni lhan cig skyes pa las so //
translated: Born from that means born from the connate.

original: de yang ji ltar nyams su blangs she na zhu ba'i rnam pa ni kun rdzob kunda lta bu'o //
analyzed: de yang ji ltar nyams su blangs she na zhu ba'i rnam pa ni kun rdzob kunda lta bu'o //
translated: How is that practiced?

original: bcom ldan ni he ru ka ste longs sku'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan ni he ru ka ste longs sku'o //
translated: The Blessed One is Heruka, the enjoyment body.

original: bde ba ni don dam mo //
analyzed: bde ba ni don dam mo //
translated: Bliss is the ultimate.

original: gdod ma ni bdag med ma ste chos sku'o //
analyzed: gdod ma ni bdag med ma ste chos sku'o //
translated: The beginning is Nairātmya, the truth body.

original: de dag mjug bsdu ba'i phyir gcig dang du ma bral ba ni yid kyi rgyu ba nyon mongs pa'i bde ba bral ba ste mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de dag mjug bsdu ba'i phyir gcig dang du ma bral ba ni yid kyi rgyu ba nyon mongs pa'i bde ba bral ba ste mi rtog pa'o //
translated: In order to summarize those, free from one and many is free from the bliss of the afflictions of mental movement, which is nonconceptuality.

original: skad cig gcig ni skad cig @274b dang bral ba'i mi 'gyur ba gcig pa ste /
analyzed: skad cig gcig ni skad cig @274b dang bral ba'i mi 'gyur ba gcig pa ste /
translated: One instant is the unchanging one, free from instants.

original: phyag rgya chen po rang 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po rang 'byung ba'o //
translated: It is the self-originated mahāmudrā.

original: mchog dga' ni 'ba' zhig tu dga' ba ste bde ba'o //
analyzed: mchog dga' ni 'ba' zhig tu dga' ba ste bde ba'o //
translated: Supreme joy is the bliss of mere joy.

original: rang rig pa ni sems so //
analyzed: rang rig pa ni sems so //
translated: Self-awareness is the mind.

original: ye shes 'di ni 'di nyid bde ba dang / mi rtog pa dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: ye shes 'di ni 'di nyid bde ba dang / mi rtog pa dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: This gnosis is the gnosis of the inseparability of bliss and nonconceptuality.

original: yang 'di shes pa ni 'bras bu yang bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang 'di shes pa ni 'bras bu yang bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to also explain the result of knowing this,

original: dag gi lam 'das ni rtog pa dang brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dag gi lam 'das ni rtog pa dang brjod pa'o //
translated: the path of the pure is beyond thought and expression.

original: spyod yul ni gnyug ma'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: spyod yul ni gnyug ma'i dbang po'o //
translated: The domain is the innate sense faculties.

original: byin brlabs rim pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: byin brlabs rim pa ni rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The stage of consecration is the stage of self-consecration.

original: kun mkhyen ye shes ni sa bcu gsum dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes ni sa bcu gsum dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Omniscient wisdom is equivalent to the thirteenth stage.

original: de yang sangs rgyas dang mnyam nas la sogs pas mi gnod dam zhe na /🔽de yis brtag pas /
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas dang mnyam nas la sogs pas mi gnod dam zhe na / de yis brtag pas /
translated: If one is equal to the buddhas, is one not harmed by the afflictions?

original: mi gnod par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi gnod par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that one is not harmed by investigating that,

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' rtag pa smin pa'o //
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' rtag pa smin pa'o //
translated: it states, “the elements of earth, water, fire, wind, and space are always ripe.”

original: rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba'am dbye ba ni rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba'am dbye ba ni rtog pa'o //
translated: The divisions of the sensations of one’s own and others’ awareness are concepts.🔽“

original: kun ni rtog pas brtags pa kun no //
analyzed: kun ni rtog pas brtags pa kun no //
translated: All” refers to all concepts.🔽“

original: skad cig ni ye shes nyid do //
analyzed: skad cig ni ye shes nyid do //
translated: Instantly” refers to wisdom itself.

original: mi gnod pa'am mi 'ching ba des mi gnod pas na sangs rgyas dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: mi gnod pa'am mi 'ching ba des mi gnod pas na sangs rgyas dang 'dra'o //
translated: Since one is not harmed by that which does not harm or bind, one is equal to the buddhas.🔽Can one emanate and transform?

original: yang sprul zhing bsgyur bar nus sam zhe na /
analyzed: yang sprul zhing bsgyur bar nus sam zhe na /
translated: Can you emanate and transform?🔽

original: mtho ris mi yul rkang 'og tu //
analyzed: mtho ris mi yul rkang 'og tu //
translated: The higher realms and the human realm are under one’s foot.”

original: zhes bya ba ni sa bla sa 'og sa stengs gsum mo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa bla sa 'og sa stengs gsum mo //
translated: The three are the upper, lower, and middle realms.🔽“

original: skad cig ni 'dod na de ma thag go //
analyzed: skad cig ni 'dod na de ma thag go //
translated: Instantly” means that if one wishes, it is immediate.

original: gzugs gcig gam ni gang yang rung bar ro //
analyzed: gzugs gcig gam ni gang yang rung bar ro //
translated: One form or any other.

original: 'gyur bar ni sprul zhing bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyur bar ni sprul zhing bsgyur ba'o //
translated: One transforms and changes.

original: de dag gis ni brtag pas mi gnod cing sprul par bstan nas /
analyzed: de dag gis ni brtag pas mi gnod cing sprul par bstan nas /
translated: Having taught that it is not harmed by investigation,

original: da ni rtog pas kyang mi gnod pa ston te /
analyzed: da ni rtog pas kyang mi gnod pa ston te /
translated: now he teaches that it is not harmed by imagination.

original: rang gzhan cha'i rnam rtog gis zhes pa ni gzung 'dzin nam rang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: rang gzhan cha'i rnam rtog gis zhes pa ni gzung 'dzin nam rang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The imagination of one's own and others' parts is the imagination of subject and object, or of oneself and others.

original: mi gnod pa'am ma'i 'ching ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir bcu gsum pa dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: mi gnod pa'am ma'i 'ching ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir bcu gsum pa dang mtshungs so //
translated: It is not harmed, or bound by the mother, because it is unborn, like the thirteenth.

original: da ni lam gnyis gsang ba thun mong ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni lam gnyis gsang ba thun mong ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the two paths as the uncommon secret,

original: thams cad rig byed ni bram ze la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad rig byed ni bram ze la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'o //
translated: the Vedas are the worldly [teachings] of Brahmins and so forth.

original: grub mtha' ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang pha rol phyin pa'o //
analyzed: grub mtha' ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang pha rol phyin pa'o //
translated: The philosophical systems are the Hearers, Solitary Realizers, and Perfection [Vehicle].

original: las rgyas la sogs pas ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do //
analyzed: las rgyas la sogs pas ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do //
translated: The Action, Conduct, and Yoga [Tantras] are by means of the action seal and so forth.

original: dag pa'i dngos grub mi grub pa ni de dag la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub mi skye bas so //
analyzed: dag pa'i dngos grub mi grub pa ni de dag la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub mi skye bas so //
translated: The non-establishment of the pure spiritual powers is because the spiritual powers of the great seal are not generated in them.

original: rang rang gi 'bras bu'i dngos grub yod do zhe na /
analyzed: rang rang gi 'bras bu'i dngos grub yod do zhe na /
translated: If it is said that there is the spiritual power of the result of each one,

original: phyag rgya chen po bskyed rim nyung ldan la brten nas /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bskyed rim nyung ldan la brten nas /
translated: then, in dependence on the great seal that is endowed with the small creation stage,

original: gnyug ma'i dbang por ma skyes bar du yid kyis brtags pa'i 'bras bu thob kyang yang ni srid par @275a * //
analyzed: gnyug ma'i dbang por ma skyes bar du yid kyis brtags pa'i 'bras bu thob kyang yang ni srid par @275a * //
translated: even though the result that is mentally imagined is obtained until the innate faculty is generated,

original: skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will be born again in existence.

original: de'i phyir 'jig rten 'di ni tshe 'di'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig rten 'di ni tshe 'di'o //
translated: Therefore, this world is this life.

original: pha rol ni skye ba gzhan du'o //
analyzed: pha rol ni skye ba gzhan du'o //
translated: The other side is another birth.

original: de med pas ni lam gnyis so //
analyzed: de med pas ni lam gnyis so //
translated: Because of the non-existence of that, there are two paths.

original: dngos grub med ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med do //
analyzed: dngos grub med ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med do //
translated: Without spiritual powers, there is the indivisibility of method and wisdom.

original: da ni rnal 'byor ma ma'i rgyud dag las kyang bla na med pa'i rgyud khyad par du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor ma ma'i rgyud dag las kyang bla na med pa'i rgyud khyad par du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the superiority of the unsurpassed tantra even in the mother and son tantras,

original: gang gis mi shes pa ni bla ma'i rgyud shes pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: gang gis mi shes pa ni bla ma'i rgyud shes pas kyang ngo //
translated: it says, “By whom it is not known,” that is, even by knowing the master tantras.

original: kye'i rdo rje ni lhan skyes ston pa'i rgyud do //
analyzed: kye'i rdo rje ni lhan skyes ston pa'i rgyud do //
translated: “Hevajra” is the tantra that teaches the connate.

original: de ni de rnams so //
analyzed: de ni de rnams so //
translated: That is them.

original: ngal ba ni bla ma'i rgyud shes pa'o //
analyzed: ngal ba ni bla ma'i rgyud shes pa'o //
translated: Exhaustion is the teacher's tantra.

original: don med ni rnal 'byor rgyud la sogs pa gzhan dag go //
analyzed: don med ni rnal 'byor rgyud la sogs pa gzhan dag go //
translated: Meaningless is the other tantras, such as the Yoga Tantra.

original: yang na ngal ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang grub mtha' rnams so //
analyzed: yang na ngal ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang grub mtha' rnams so //
translated: Alternatively, exhaustion is the perfections and the philosophical systems.

original: don med pa ni mu stegs pa'o //
analyzed: don med pa ni mu stegs pa'o //
translated: Meaningless is the non-Buddhist [systems].

original: mi shes pa ni bya ba'i rgyud nas bla ma'i rgyud man chad do //
analyzed: mi shes pa ni bya ba'i rgyud nas bla ma'i rgyud man chad do //
translated: Ignorance is from the Action Tantra up to the teacher's tantra.

original: 'on kyang bla ma'i rgyud las kyang ji ltar khyad par du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang bla ma'i rgyud las kyang ji ltar khyad par du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how is there a distinction even from the teacher's tantra?

original: de dag gis ni don dam pa byang chub sems kyi che ba'i bdag nyid tsam ston la /
analyzed: de dag gis ni don dam pa byang chub sems kyi che ba'i bdag nyid tsam ston la /
translated: Those [tantras] teach only the greatness of the ultimate mind of enlightenment.

original: 'dis ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nyung ldan chags pa dang ma rungs pa rjes su gzung pa dang ; / tshar gcad pa la brten nas phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag lhan cig skyes pa rang 'bar ba'i thabs nye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nyung ldan chags pa dang ma rungs pa rjes su gzung pa dang ; / tshar gcad pa la brten nas phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag lhan cig skyes pa rang 'bar ba'i thabs nye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This [tantra] is superior because it is the means for the self-arisen innate [expe-rience of the] Great Seal, which is based on the method of the small amount of the creation stage, the acceptance of the passionate and the violent, and the destruction [of the violent].

original: de'i phyir chu bo'i rgyun ni mnyam par gzhag pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa las langs pa'i rnal 'byor rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chu bo'i rgyun ni mnyam par gzhag pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa las langs pa'i rnal 'byor rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the flow of the river is the uninterrupted yoga of equipoise and post-equipoise.

original: mar me 'bar ba ni lha'i rnam pa dang nga rgyal lo //
analyzed: mar me 'bar ba ni lha'i rnam pa dang nga rgyal lo //
translated: The blazing lamp is the divine form and pride.

original: rtag tu ni rgyun du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu ni rgyun du'o //
translated: Always means continuously.

original: 'di nyid ni he ru ka'am bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni he ru ka'am bdag med ma'o //
translated: This itself is Heruka or Nairātmya.

original: rnal 'byor ni snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Yoga is endowed with meditative union.

original: nyin dang mtshan du bzhag pa ni de dag tu gdams pa ste /
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du bzhag pa ni de dag tu gdams pa ste /
translated: The placement day and night is the instruction in those.

original: nyin mtshan gcig la sgom pa thun bzhir mi sgom pa thun bzhir mnyam gzhag dang spyod lam du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nyin mtshan gcig la sgom pa thun bzhir mi sgom pa thun bzhir mnyam gzhag dang spyod lam du shes par bya'o //
translated: In one day and night, one should know the meditation in four sessions and the equipoise in four sessions.

original: yang chu'i rgyun ni zla ba byang chub sems so //
analyzed: yang chu'i rgyun ni zla ba byang chub sems so //
translated: Again, the flow of the river is the lunar bodhicitta.

original: mar me 'bar ba ni snyoms par 'jug pas 'dod chags chen po'i me'o //
analyzed: mar me 'bar ba ni snyoms par 'jug pas 'dod chags chen po'i me'o //
translated: The blazing lamp is the fire of great passion through meditative union.

original: rtag tu de nyid ni zhu ba sngon du song ba'i don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu de nyid ni zhu ba sngon du song ba'i don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: Always that itself is the ultimate coemergence preceded by the melting.

original: rnal 'byor ni tha mal gyi rnam par rtog pa bsgyur nas thabs dang shes rab kyi lhar gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni tha mal gyi rnam par rtog pa bsgyur nas thabs dang shes rab kyi lhar gsal ba'o //
translated: Yoga is the transformation of ordinary conceptuality into the clarity of the deity of method and wisdom.

original: nyin mo 'char ba ste dga' ba dang mchog dga'o //
analyzed: nyin mo 'char ba ste dga' ba dang mchog dga'o //
translated: Day is rising, which is joy and supreme joy.

original: mtshan mo ni nub pa ste dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo ni nub pa ste dga' bral gyi dga' ba'o //
translated: Night is setting, which is the joy of the absence of joy.

original: rnam par gzhag pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
translated: The arrangement is in the nature of the innate.

original: de yang dang po chu tshod dang thun phyed dang thun gcig dang nyi ma phyed dang mtshan mo dang je che je che la bslab pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dang po chu tshod dang thun phyed dang thun gcig dang nyi ma phyed dang mtshan mo dang je che je che la bslab pa'o //
translated: Moreover, one should train in that for a period of time, a half-period, one period, half a day, a night, and so on.

original: yang chu bo'i rgyun @275b ni ham las rdo rje 'dzin pa gso ba'o //
analyzed: yang chu bo'i rgyun @275b ni ham las rdo rje 'dzin pa gso ba'o //
translated: The river flow is the life of the vajra holder from the syllable ham.

original: mar me 'bar ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsad pa ste gtum mo spar ba'o //
analyzed: mar me 'bar ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsad pa ste gtum mo spar ba'o //
translated: The blazing lamp is the killing of the tathāgatas, which is the ignition of caṇḍālī.

original: rtag tu de nyid ni de gnyis rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //🔽rnal 'byor ni sbyor ba ste nyin mtshan ni steng 'og gi g-yas g-yon no //
analyzed: rtag tu de nyid ni de gnyis rgyun mi 'chad pa'o // rnal 'byor ni sbyor ba ste nyin mtshan ni steng 'og gi g-yas g-yon no //
translated: Always that is the uninterrupted continuity of those two.🔽Yoga is the union of day and night, which is above and below, right and left.

original: rnam par gzhag pa ni steng 'og gi thig le gzhag pa'am ;
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa ni steng 'og gi thig le gzhag pa'am ;
translated: The arrangement is the placement of the upper and lower bindus.

original: / g-yas g-yon aa wa dh'u t'ir ro //
analyzed: / g-yas g-yon aa wa dh'u t'ir ro //
translated: On the right and left are the avadhūtī.

original: de ni rang lus thabs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rang lus thabs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the method of one’s own body.

original: yang chu bo'i rgyun ni snang ba'o //
analyzed: yang chu bo'i rgyun ni snang ba'o //
translated: The river’s flow is appearance.

original: mar me'i rtse mo ni stong pa shes rab po //
analyzed: mar me'i rtse mo ni stong pa shes rab po //
translated: The tip of the flame is emptiness, wisdom.

original: rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor ni snang ba stong pa dbyer med du bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor ni snang ba stong pa dbyer med du bsgom pa'o //
translated: The yoga of thatness is always meditating on the inseparability of appearance and emptiness.

original: nyin dang mtshan mo ni brda yis mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mo ni brda yis mtshon pa ste /
translated: Day and night are illustrated by symbols.

original: nyin mo snang ba mtshan mo shes //
analyzed: nyin mo snang ba mtshan mo shes //
translated: Day is appearance; night is wisdom.

original: de gnyis mtshams dbyer med bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de gnyis mtshams dbyer med bsgom pa'o //
translated: Those two are meditated on as being inseparable.

original: yang na chu bo'i rgyun ni phyag rgya chen po'o //🔽rab 'bar ni kun rdzob lhan skyes so //
analyzed: yang na chu bo'i rgyun ni phyag rgya chen po'o // rab 'bar ni kun rdzob lhan skyes so //
translated: Alternatively, the river’s flow is mahāmudrā.🔽The blazing is the connate relative [truth].

original: mar me 'bar ba ni don dam lhan skyes te ye shes rang 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: mar me 'bar ba ni don dam lhan skyes te ye shes rang 'bar ba'o //
translated: The blazing lamp is the connate ultimate [truth], the self-arisen gnosis.

original: rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor ni dbang po rang snang ngo //
analyzed: rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor ni dbang po rang snang ngo //

original: nyin dang mtshan du ni spyod lam dang bsre ba'o //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan du ni spyod lam dang bsre ba'o //
