translated: The driving away by the vajra gait is the circumambulation of the maṇḍala with the gait of the single-pronged vajra, the three-pronged vajra, and the crossed vajra.

original: stang stabs kyis bsrung ba ni g-yas brkyang dang ni g-yon brkyang dang / sa ga dang ni zlum po dang // mnyam pa'i 'dug stangs rnam pa lnga /
analyzed: stang stabs kyis bsrung ba ni g-yas brkyang dang ni g-yon brkyang dang / sa ga dang ni zlum po dang // mnyam pa'i 'dug stangs rnam pa lnga /
translated: The protection by the dance is the five types of sitting postures: the right extended, the left extended, the cross-legged, the round, and the even.

original: shar nas brtsams te dbus kyi bar du bsdus nas rnam pa lnga po bya /
analyzed: shar nas brtsams te dbus kyi bar du bsdus nas rnam pa lnga po bya /
translated: Having begun in the east and gathered up to the center, one should perform the five types.

original: rgyas par 'dod nas stang bstabs ni drug cu rtsa gcig la sogs te sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul du bya /
analyzed: rgyas par 'dod nas stang bstabs ni drug cu rtsa gcig la sogs te sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul du bya /
translated: If one wishes to elaborate, one should make sixty-one prostrations, and so forth, in the manner of the Net of Illusory Mandalas.

original: rdo rje phur pas bsrung ba ni phur bu rnam pa lnga /
analyzed: rdo rje phur pas bsrung ba ni phur bu rnam pa lnga /
translated: The protection by Vajrakīla is as follows: One should generate the five types of kīlas,

original: stod khro bo'i rnam pa smad phur bu rtse gcig par bskyed la /
analyzed: stod khro bo'i rnam pa smad phur bu rtse gcig par bskyed la /
translated: with an upper part in the form of a wrathful one and a lower part in the form of a single-pointed kīla.

original: phur ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te //
analyzed: phur ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te //
translated: Recite the kīla mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: gha gha gha ta'i sngags kyis phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar gdab par bya'o /
analyzed: gha gha gha ta'i sngags kyis phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar gdab par bya'o /
translated: With the mantra of Gha gha ghaṭa, one should cast the kīlas in the four directions and the center.

original: sta gon gyi cho ga ni 'og nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sta gon gyi cho ga ni 'og nas shes par bya'o //
translated: The rite of the prelude should be understood from below.

original: de'i rjes la thig bri ba'i phyir thig skud sar pa ni gzhan du longs ma spyad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la thig bri ba'i phyir thig skud sar pa ni gzhan du longs ma spyad pa'o //
translated: After that, in order to draw the maṇḍala lines, the thread should be new and not used elsewhere.

original: tshad ni nyid 'gyur dang nyi shu cha'o //
analyzed: tshad ni nyid 'gyur dang nyi shu cha'o //
translated: The measure is one cubit and twenty-four finger breadths.

original: mdzes pa ni dri zhim po'i snod kyis mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: mdzes pa ni dri zhim po'i snod kyis mdzes pa'o //
translated: The beautiful is the beauty of a fragrant vessel.

original: rang 'dod de lha'i gzugs kyis ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang grogs bdag med ma'am goo r'is so //
analyzed: rang 'dod de lha'i gzugs kyis ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang grogs bdag med ma'am goo r'is so //
translated: One’s desire is the form of the deity, Hevajra with the consort Nairātmyā or Gaurī.

original: shes rab can @280b gyis gdab pa ni las dang bya ba la mkhas pas sa'i cha dbye ba las ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab can @280b gyis gdab pa ni las dang bya ba la mkhas pas sa'i cha dbye ba las ma 'das pa'o //
translated: The one who is wise in the placement of the thread is skilled in the work and action, and does not go beyond the division of the parts of the ground.

original: de la thig sgrub pa'i cho ga ni ras bal rin la ma rtsegs par nyos la /
analyzed: de la thig sgrub pa'i cho ga ni ras bal rin la ma rtsegs par nyos la /
translated: The ritual of establishing the thread is as follows: Having purchased cotton without paying the price,

original: khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu mas bkal te /
analyzed: khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu mas bkal te /
translated: a young man and woman should spin it.

original: srad bu lnga kha dog so sor bsgyur nas stod gtsang ma'i nang du phyogs so sor bzhag ste /
analyzed: srad bu lnga kha dog so sor bsgyur nas stod gtsang ma'i nang du phyogs so sor bzhag ste /
translated: Having dyed the five threads in different colors, place them in a clean place in the four directions.

original: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um bkod la de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bskyed /
analyzed: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um bkod la de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bskyed /
translated: Arrange the syllables bhrūṃ aṃ jriṃ khaṃ hūṃ, and generate the five transcendent ones.

original: rang bzhin pa spyan drangs la bstim /
analyzed: rang bzhin pa spyan drangs la bstim /
translated: Invite the naturally present ones and absorb them.

original: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta la sogs pas bzlas la bsgril bar bya'o //
analyzed: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta la sogs pas bzlas la bsgril bar bya'o //
translated: Having recited “anyonyānuga” and so on, roll them up.

original: de la mchod pa lngas mchod //
analyzed: de la mchod pa lngas mchod //
translated: Worship them with the five offerings.

original: thig sgrub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: thig sgrub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the procedure for establishing the thread.

original: de nas bdag nyid grogs dang bcas pas ye shes kyi thig gdab pa dang las kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid grogs dang bcas pas ye shes kyi thig gdab pa dang las kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: Then, oneself and the assistants should place the gnosis thread and the action thread.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the purpose of that?

original: 'og nas ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'og nas ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The following is to be connected with the teacher said this mandala.

original: de'i rjes la tshon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rjes la tshon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: After that, in order to teach the colors,

original: rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni rin chen lnga'i phyi mar 'brel lo //
analyzed: rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni rin chen lnga'i phyi mar 'brel lo //
translated: the colors of the best sand, and the five precious substances are connected in the latter [line].

original: yang 'bring po ni yang na 'bras bu la sogs par 'brel lo //
analyzed: yang 'bring po ni yang na 'bras bu la sogs par 'brel lo //
translated: The medium is also connected with rice and so forth.

original: tha ma ni so phag dang sa la sogs pa'i tshon te brtag pa phyi mar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: tha ma ni so phag dang sa la sogs pa'i tshon te brtag pa phyi mar shes par bya'o //
translated: The lowest is the colors of brick, earth, and so forth, which should be understood from the later examination.

original: tshon sgrub pa ni tshon rtsi kha dog lnga phyogs so sor bzhag la sngar gyi yig 'bru lnga yis de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bskyed rang bzhin pa bstim /
analyzed: tshon sgrub pa ni tshon rtsi kha dog lnga phyogs so sor bzhag la sngar gyi yig 'bru lnga yis de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bskyed rang bzhin pa bstim /
translated: The accomplishment of the colors is as follows: Having placed the five colored powders in their respective directions, one should generate the five transcendent ones with the five seed syllables mentioned above and dissolve them into the nature [of the colors].

original: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchog /
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchog /
translated: Having made offerings with the five offerings,

original: badzra sa ma ya'i sngags bzlas la tshon rtsi spar ro //
analyzed: badzra sa ma ya'i sngags bzlas la tshon rtsi spar ro //
translated: one should recite the mantra of Vajrasamaya and pick up the colored powders.

original: gzi bskyed de dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas tshigs su bcad pa re brjod cing mtho gang tsam drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzi bskyed de dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas tshigs su bcad pa re brjod cing mtho gang tsam drang bar bya'o //
translated: Having generated brilliance, one should draw [the lines] straight from the northeast corner, reciting a verse for each line.

original: de yang / dkar po ser po dmar po ljang //
analyzed: de yang / dkar po ser po dmar po ljang //
translated: White, yellow, red, green,

original: mthing ga nang du shes bya ste //
analyzed: mthing ga nang du shes bya ste //
translated: and blue should be known inside.

original: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
analyzed: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
translated: This is explained as the sequence of colors.

original: de bzhin phyogs kyang shes par bya ;
analyzed: de bzhin phyogs kyang shes par bya ;
translated: The directions should be known in the same way.

original: / de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir ston pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: / de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir ston pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: After that, in order to teach the characteristics of the maṇḍala, the teacher and so on are mentioned.

original: ston pa gzhan dag kyang do //
analyzed: ston pa gzhan dag kyang do //
translated: The teacher is also abandoned.

original: yang na sdud par byed pa khas len pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sdud par byed pa khas len pa'o //
translated: Or, the one who accepts the compiler.

original: dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs pa ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs pa ni //
translated: This maṇḍala is said to be

original: gzhan dag dang 'dra bas 'dir yang 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag dang 'dra bas 'dir yang 'dod pa'o //
translated: like the others, so it is accepted here.

original: de yang tshigs bcad gnyis te go sla'o ;
analyzed: de yang tshigs bcad gnyis te go sla'o ;
translated: That is also two verses, easy to understand.

original: / de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor khyad par bya ba mtshan ma dgod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: / de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor khyad par bya ba mtshan ma dgod pa'i phyir /
translated: After that, in order to set out the signs of the special maṇḍala,

original: 'phar ma gnyis bzang la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te go sla'o //
analyzed: 'phar ma gnyis bzang la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te go sla'o //
translated: the two verses beginning with “the two excellent platforms” are easy to understand.

original: de'i rjes su bum pa la sogs pa rdzas dgod cing 'brel pa bstan pa'i phyir bum pa brgyad la sogs pa ni bcu ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes su bum pa la sogs pa rdzas dgod cing 'brel pa bstan pa'i phyir bum pa brgyad la sogs pa ni bcu ste /
translated: After that, in order to teach the placement and connection of the substances such as the vases, there are ten, beginning with the eight vases.

original: rnam par @281a * //
analyzed: rnam par @281a * //
translated: The second is the aspect of the object of the wisdom of meditative equipoise.🔽

original: rgyal ba dang las thams cad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba dang las thams cad pa'o //
translated: The victorious and the all-activity vases.

original: 'dir ni bum pa rgyas pa ni bcu drug ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni bum pa rgyas pa ni bcu drug ste /
translated: Here, the extensive vases are sixteen:

original: lha mo bco lnga la bum pa re re /
analyzed: lha mo bco lnga la bum pa re re /
translated: fifteen goddesses, each with a vase,

original: las thams cad ba dang bcu drug go //
analyzed: las thams cad ba dang bcu drug go //
translated: and the all-activity vase, making sixteen.

original: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la ni bum pa bcu'o //
analyzed: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la ni bum pa bcu'o //
translated: For glorious Hevajra, there are ten vases.

original: bsdu pa ni drug tu shes par bya ste /
analyzed: bsdu pa ni drug tu shes par bya ste /
translated: The concise is known to be six:

original: rigs lnga la re re las thams cad pa dang drug go //
analyzed: rigs lnga la re re las thams cad pa dang drug go //
translated: one for each of the five families and the all-activity vase, making six.

original: gang ba'i bum pa ni nges pa med de ci 'byor pa dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang ba'i bum pa ni nges pa med de ci 'byor pa dbul bar bya'o //
translated: The filled vase is indefinite; offer whatever is available.

original: rnam par rgyal ba shar du bkod pa ni bum pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba shar du bkod pa ni bum pa ste /
translated: The victorious vase is placed in the east.

original: gtso bo'i mdun nas shar du'o //
analyzed: gtso bo'i mdun nas shar du'o //
translated: In front of the principal, in the east.

original: las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni shar gyi sgor ro //
analyzed: las thams cad pa'i bum pa ni shar gyi sgor ro //
translated: The all-activity vase is at the eastern gate.

original: gzhan dag go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag go sla'o //
translated: The others are easy to understand.

original: de'i rjes la ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo sgrub thabs ltar bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir ni dam tshig gi 'khor lo sgrub thabs ltar bskyed pa'o //
translated: After that, just as in the meditation, here the pledge wheel is generated according to the sādhana.

original: de nyid ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bsrung ba ni sngags kyis so //
analyzed: bsrung ba ni sngags kyis so //
translated: Protection is with the mantra.

original: gsungs pa'am brjod pa ni aom raksha la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa'am brjod pa ni aom raksha la sogs pa ste /
translated: The statement or expression is the syllable oṃ rakṣa and so forth.

original: bdag bsrung ba nas brtsams te bya'o //
analyzed: bdag bsrung ba nas brtsams te bya'o //
translated: [The rite] should be performed beginning with the protection of oneself.

original: yang na ye shes kyi 'khor lo bcug ste bgegs bsal ba'o //
analyzed: yang na ye shes kyi 'khor lo bcug ste bgegs bsal ba'o //
translated: Alternatively, having caused the wheel of pristine consciousness to enter, the obstructors are removed.

original: de'i rjes la mchod pa ni lha mo brgyad la sogs pas /
analyzed: de'i rjes la mchod pa ni lha mo brgyad la sogs pas /
translated: After that, the offering is to the eight goddesses and so forth,

original: mdun du 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa la'o //
analyzed: mdun du 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa la'o //
translated: who are invited with light rays in front.

original: gsol ba gdab pa ni mchod pas mnyas pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la'o //
analyzed: gsol ba gdab pa ni mchod pas mnyas pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la'o //
translated: The supplication is to the buddhas and bodhisattvas, who are pleased by the offering.

original: de yang de nas he ru ka'i gzugs kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang de nas he ru ka'i gzugs kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, empowerment is conferred by the form of Heruka.

original: ji ltar bshad pa ni bshad pa'i rgyud dag gam rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du'o /
analyzed: ji ltar bshad pa ni bshad pa'i rgyud dag gam rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du'o /
translated: The explanation is in the explanatory tantras or the yoga tantras.

original: 'dir yang bya ba ni mchod bstod la sogs pa rgyas par 'dod na'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang bya ba ni mchod bstod la sogs pa rgyas par 'dod na'o //
translated: Here, the rite is the extensive offering, praise, and so forth, if one wishes.

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the samādhi:

original: phyag mtshan bkod nas ma dang sta go na gyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bkod pa phab ste /
analyzed: phyag mtshan bkod nas ma dang sta go na gyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bkod pa phab ste /
translated: Having arranged the hand implements, the maṇḍala of the mother and father is arranged in space and brought down.

original: gnyis bsre bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis bsre bar bya'o //
translated: The two are mixed.

original: de nas bum pa dgod pa dang rgyan bri ba dang mchod pa rnams bshams la /
analyzed: de nas bum pa dgod pa dang rgyan bri ba dang mchod pa rnams bshams la /
translated: Then, having arranged the vase, the drawings of the ornaments, and the offerings,

original: bdag nyid khrus dang gtsang spra dang rgyan gyon nas /
analyzed: bdag nyid khrus dang gtsang spra dang rgyan gyon nas /
translated: one should bathe, be clean, and put on ornaments.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor stan bde ba la 'dug ste gtso bo dang mos par gcig tu bsams te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor stan bde ba la 'dug ste gtso bo dang mos par gcig tu bsams te /
translated: Sitting on a comfortable seat in the east of the maṇḍala, one should imagine that one is the principal deity.

original: bdag bsrung ba nas tshogs bsags pa dang / rten gyi rnal 'byor bsgom pa dang / brten pa lha'i dkyil 'khor le'u brgyad pa ltar bsgoms te /
analyzed: bdag bsrung ba nas tshogs bsags pa dang / rten gyi rnal 'byor bsgom pa dang / brten pa lha'i dkyil 'khor le'u brgyad pa ltar bsgoms te /
translated: From the self-protection up to the accumulation of the accumulations, the meditation of the yoga of the support, and the maṇḍala of the supported deity, which is meditated on according to the eighth chapter,

original: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bya ba ni bdag nyid la ldan pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bya ba ni bdag nyid la ldan pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: up to the offering, praise, and tasting of elixir, is the perfect endowment of the self.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa ni sa bon nam phyag mtshan tsam las lha mo'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa ni sa bon nam phyag mtshan tsam las lha mo'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed /
translated: Next, the maṇḍala accomplishment is the complete generation of the wheel of the goddesses from the mere seed or insignia.

original: ye shes pa spyan drangs /
analyzed: ye shes pa spyan drangs /
translated: The awareness beings are invoked.

original: skye @281b mched byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: skye @281b mched byin gyis brlabs //
translated: The sense bases are empowered.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are empowered.

original: dbang bskur mchod pa dang bstod pa rgyas par bya /
analyzed: dbang bskur mchod pa dang bstod pa rgyas par bya /
translated: The extensive empowerment, offering, and praise are performed.

original: bdud rtsi myang /
analyzed: bdud rtsi myang /
translated: One should perform the tasting of elixir

original: bzlas pa'i bar du bya'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i bar du bya'o //
translated: up to the recitation.

original: de'i rjes la gang zhig dbang ni rab tu dbye ba ni dbang bzhi'i rim pa'am chu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la gang zhig dbang ni rab tu dbye ba ni dbang bzhi'i rim pa'am chu la sogs pa'o //
translated: After that, the division of the empowerment is the stage of the four empowerments or the water empowerment, and so on.

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs sbyin //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs sbyin //
translated: The feast offering of one’s maṇḍala

original: zhes pa ni khyad par gyi lugs kyis so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni khyad par gyi lugs kyis so //
translated: is the special system.

original: mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid //
analyzed: mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid //
translated: The offering and supplication

original: ces 'dir yang 'brel te /🔽mchod pa ni thun mong gi mchod pa dang / khyad par gyi mchod pa brtag pa phyi ma nas /
analyzed: ces 'dir yang 'brel te / mchod pa ni thun mong gi mchod pa dang / khyad par gyi mchod pa brtag pa phyi ma nas /
translated: are also connected here.

original: zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang // zhes 'dir 'brel /
analyzed: zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang // zhes 'dir 'brel /
translated: The offering is the common offering and the special offering, which are connected here with “delicious food and drink” in the Later Tantra.

original: thun mong gi gsol ba gdab pa dang / dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //🔽zhes bya ba dang / khyad par gyi gsol ba gdab pa ni /
analyzed: thun mong gi gsol ba gdab pa dang / dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas // zhes bya ba dang / khyad par gyi gsol ba gdab pa ni /
translated: The common supplication is “You, Great Joy, are my teacher” and so on.

original: 'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu /
analyzed: 'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu /
translated: The special supplication is connected here with “Those of us who are sinking in the swamp of saṃsāra

original: bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dir 'brel lo //
analyzed: bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dir 'brel lo //
translated: are without refuge; please protect me.”

original: dbang bskur ba thun mong rig pa'i dbang lnga dang / khyad par bdag po'i dbang dang drug ste //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thun mong rig pa'i dbang lnga dang / khyad par bdag po'i dbang dang drug ste //
translated: The initiation is the five common initiations of knowledge and the special sixth, the lord initiation.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: And it is said:

original: drug pa bdag po'i dbang gis dang // zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drug pa bdag po'i dbang gis dang // zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By the sixth, the lord initiation.

original: de'i rjes la gsang ba'i dbang bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rjes la gsang ba'i dbang bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: After that, in order to explain the secret initiation,

original: der zhes pa ni bum pa'i dbang gis gnas de nyid du'o //
analyzed: der zhes pa ni bum pa'i dbang gis gnas de nyid du'o //
translated: there means in that very place of the vase initiation.

original: rigs lnga las byung ba ni dman pa rnams dang / bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa ste /
analyzed: rigs lnga las byung ba ni dman pa rnams dang / bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa ste /
translated: Having arisen from the five clans means having been born into the low clans and the brahmin clan.

original: des rig pa bskyed pa ste rig ma'o ;
analyzed: des rig pa bskyed pa ste rig ma'o ;
translated: The knowledge woman is one who generates knowledge.

original: / bzang mo ni skro  gsum gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: / bzang mo ni skro  gsum gyi khyad par ro //
translated: The good woman is one who has the three qualifications.

original: gzhug pa ni las dang po pa yin na slob ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: gzhug pa ni las dang po pa yin na slob ma bzhin du'o //
translated: If one is a beginner, one should be like a student.

original: yang na ji ltar gang rnyed ni rigs dang sgo gsum gyi yon tan dang mi ldan kyang ngo //
analyzed: yang na ji ltar gang rnyed ni rigs dang sgo gsum gyi yon tan dang mi ldan kyang ngo //
translated: Or else, whatever is found means one who does not have the qualities of clan and the three doors.

original: de bzhin ni phyogs gnyis pa de la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin ni phyogs gnyis pa de la'o //
translated: In the same way means in the second part.

original: bcu drug lon pa'i na tshod gtso bor gyur pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bcu drug lon pa'i na tshod gtso bor gyur pa kho na'o //
translated: The age of sixteen is the most important.

original: khu ba ldan pa ni shes rab rang bzhin ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: khu ba ldan pa ni shes rab rang bzhin ma yin pa'o //
translated: The one with semen is not the nature of wisdom.

original: ji srid ni gang gi tshe'o //
analyzed: ji srid ni gang gi tshe'o //
translated: For as long as means at whatever time.

original: de srid ni de'i tshe'o //
analyzed: de srid ni de'i tshe'o //
translated: For that long means at that time.

original: phyag rgya bsten pa ni lang tsho dang ldan pa de nyid chang la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bsten pa ni lang tsho dang ldan pa de nyid chang la sogs pa'o //
translated: The reliance on the consort is the youth endowed with wine and so forth.

original: phyag rgya ni gdong bcing ba ni 'jug pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni gdong bcing ba ni 'jug pa'i tshul lo //
translated: The consort is the binding of the face, the method of entry.

original: thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin ni slob ma 'jug pa dang phan tshun du mthun pa'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin ni slob ma 'jug pa dang phan tshun du mthun pa'o //
translated: The face of the method is also like that, the mutual compatibility of the disciple's entry.

original: yang na phyag rgya ni gdong bcing ba ni bdud rtsi len pa'i dus su ste /
analyzed: yang na phyag rgya ni gdong bcing ba ni bdud rtsi len pa'i dus su ste /
translated: Alternatively, the consort is the binding of the face at the time of taking the elixir.

original: 'di yang bya ba'i rim pa dang nod pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang bya ba'i rim pa dang nod pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is also the sequence of action and the sequence of receiving.

original: bya ba'i rim pa ni slob ma 'jug pa bzhin du phyag rgya ma yang dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / tshul bzhin du byas la nod pa'i bdud rtsi len pa'i dus te der yang gdong bcing @282a * //
analyzed: bya ba'i rim pa ni slob ma 'jug pa bzhin du phyag rgya ma yang dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / tshul bzhin du byas la nod pa'i bdud rtsi len pa'i dus te der yang gdong bcing @282a * //
translated: The sequence of action is like the disciple's entry, the consort's entry into the maṇḍala, and the proper performance of the sequence of receiving the elixir. At that time, the face is also bound.

original: ngo ; / slob dpon la la ni 'dir zla ba gzung ba'i man ngag la yang 'chad do //
analyzed: ngo ; / slob dpon la la ni 'dir zla ba gzung ba'i man ngag la yang 'chad do //
translated: Some masters here explain the oral instruction of holding the moon.

original: 'dir ni slob dpon gyis de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba de'i chang bu la sbyin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni slob dpon gyis de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba de'i chang bu la sbyin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the master should give the morsel of that experience of reality.

original: brten pa de las gang byung ba //
analyzed: brten pa de las gang byung ba //
translated: What arises from that support

original: zhes pa bdud rtsi de nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pa bdud rtsi de nyid do //
translated: is that very nectar.

original: thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin zhes pa ni ster ba'i dus su ste /
analyzed: thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin zhes pa ni ster ba'i dus su ste /
translated: The face of the method is also like that, at the time of giving.

original: slob ma'i khar ni lhung zhes par 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i khar ni lhung zhes par 'brel ba'o //
translated: It is connected to “falls into the disciple’s mouth.”

original: da ni gsum pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gsum pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the third,

original: ro mnyam ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'o //
analyzed: ro mnyam ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'o //
translated: “equal taste” is the taste of connate joy.

original: slob ma'i spyod yul ni sngon du man ngag bstan pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i spyod yul ni sngon du man ngag bstan pa'o //
translated: The “field of experience of the disciple” is the prior teaching of the intimate instruction.

original: de nyid la yang de gsang ba'i rten nyid la'am rig ma gzhan la'o //
analyzed: de nyid la yang de gsang ba'i rten nyid la'am rig ma gzhan la'o //
translated: “In that” refers to the support of that secret or another consort.

original: bya bar bya'am nges par bya ni /
analyzed: bya bar bya'am nges par bya ni /
translated: “Should be done” or “should be ascertained”

original: sngon du man ngag bstan pa bzhin du nyams su blangs pa'o //
analyzed: sngon du man ngag bstan pa bzhin du nyams su blangs pa'o //
translated: is the practice according to the prior teaching of the intimate instruction.

original: de cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽rang rig ye shes ni don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de cir 'gyur zhe na / rang rig ye shes ni don dam lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: What happens then?🔽“One’s awareness” is the ultimate connate joy.

original: gyur pa ni kun rdzob khan skyes las te /
analyzed: gyur pa ni kun rdzob khan skyes las te /
translated: “Arising” is from the relative connate joy.

original: de dag gi rim pa brtag pa phyi ma las bstan to //
analyzed: de dag gi rim pa brtag pa phyi ma las bstan to //
translated: The sequence of those is taught in the Subsequent Tantra.

original: 'di la yang bya ba'i rim pa dang nod pa'i rim pa gnyis so //🔽gsum pas go phye ba'i slob ma'i nyams su myong ba de nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la yang bya ba'i rim pa dang nod pa'i rim pa gnyis so // gsum pas go phye ba'i slob ma'i nyams su myong ba de nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: Here, there are two sequences: the sequence of the activities and the sequence of the initiations.

original: bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: bzhi pa ste /
translated: The experience of the disciple who is opened by the third is explained in the fourth.

original: de la yang rten can dang rten med gnyis so //
analyzed: de la yang rten can dang rten med gnyis so //
translated: There are also two in that: with support and without support.

original: slob dpon la la ni rten can du yang 'dod do //
analyzed: slob dpon la la ni rten can du yang 'dod do //
translated: Some masters assert that it is with support.

original: bla ma'i gzhung gis ni tshig dbang rin po che zhes bya ste rten med kyi lus so //
analyzed: bla ma'i gzhung gis ni tshig dbang rin po che zhes bya ste rten med kyi lus so //
translated: According to the texts of the guru, the precious word initiation is called “without support,” the body.

original: de la yang dbang bzhi pa tshig dbang dang / man ngag dang gnyis su bzhed de /
analyzed: de la yang dbang bzhi pa tshig dbang dang / man ngag dang gnyis su bzhed de /
translated: There, the fourth initiation is asserted to be both the word initiation and the esoteric instructions.

original: bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //🔽de skad du yang /
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o // de skad du yang /
translated: They should be known from the guru’s mouth.

original: de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa //
translated: As such, the fourth is also like that.

original: zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: Thus, it is said.

original: de'i khyad par bstan pa ni dbang bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: de'i khyad par bstan pa ni dbang bzhi pa ste /
translated: The explanation of its distinctions is the fourth initiation.

original: rang bzhin ni gzung 'dzin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni gzung 'dzin no //
translated: The nature is the subject and object.

original: yang dag rig pa ni dang po yin yang gsum pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag rig pa ni dang po yin yang gsum pa ste /
translated: The pristine consciousness is the first, but the third.

original: de dag des spangs pa'o /
analyzed: de dag des spangs pa'o /
translated: Those are abandoned by that.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of that?

original: mi rtog pa ste /
analyzed: mi rtog pa ste /
translated: Non-conceptuality.

original: mkha' mnyam ni dpe'o /
analyzed: mkha' mnyam ni dpe'o /
translated: Space is the example.

original: rdul ni rnam par rtog pa dang / nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: rdul ni rnam par rtog pa dang / nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: Dust is conceptuality and afflictions.

original: de'i phyir stong pa nyid dpe de las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir stong pa nyid dpe de las byung ba'o //
translated: Therefore, emptiness arises from that example.

original: de dang lhan cig tshim pa ni thabs ci zhe na /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig tshim pa ni thabs ci zhe na /
translated: What is the means of being satisfied with that?

original: dngos dang dngos med ni chos can no ;
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med ni chos can no ;
translated: Entity and non-entity are the subject.

original: / bdag nyid mchog ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: / bdag nyid mchog ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The supreme self is the nature of great bliss.

original: de dag ni dbyer med pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag ni dbyer med pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate their inseparability,

original: shes rab thabs ni mi rtog pa dang bde ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab thabs ni mi rtog pa dang bde ba'o //
translated: wisdom and means are non-conceptuality and bliss.

original: shin tu 'dres pa ni dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu 'dres pa ni dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
translated: They are thoroughly mixed, meaning inseparable.

original: yang chags pa dang chags bral ni /
analyzed: yang chags pa dang chags bral ni /
translated: Moreover, attachment and non-attachment

original: mchog dga' dang dga' bral gyi rnam pas so //
analyzed: mchog dga' dang dga' bral gyi rnam pas so //
translated: are the aspects of supreme joy and the absence of joy.

original: 'dres @282b pa ni dbyer mi phyed pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'o /
analyzed: 'dres @282b pa ni dbyer mi phyed pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'i ro'o /
translated: They are mixed, meaning inseparable, the taste of co-emergence.

original: da ni de'i rang bzhin che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de'i rang bzhin che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate its nature, the greatness of the self,🔽it is said:

original: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog ni sems can kun yang lhan cig skyes pa'i 'tsho ba la brten pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog ni sems can kun yang lhan cig skyes pa'i 'tsho ba la brten pa yin te /
translated: That is the life of all living beings, which is based on the innate life of all sentient beings.

original: yi ge dam pa zhes pa ni aakshar ste mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: yi ge dam pa zhes pa ni aakshar ste mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
translated: The supreme syllable is akṣara, because it is unchanging.

original: 'gro ba'i bdag nyid ni lhan cig skyes pa de'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bdag nyid ni lhan cig skyes pa de'o //
translated: The nature of beings is that innate nature.

original: thams cad khyab pa ni sems te don dam lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad khyab pa ni sems te don dam lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It pervades all, because the ultimate is innate.

original: lus kun la gnas pa ni kun rdzob po //
analyzed: lus kun la gnas pa ni kun rdzob po //
translated: It abides in all bodies, because it is conventional.

original: dngos dang dngos med de las byung ni dngos po kun rdzob lhan cig skyes pa ni /
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med de las byung ni dngos po kun rdzob lhan cig skyes pa ni /
translated: Things and nonthings arise from it. The innate conventional thing

original: dngos med don dam du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dngos med don dam du gnas pa'o //
translated: is the ultimate nonthing.

original: yang na dngos po ste gzugs la sogs pa lnga dang / dngos med de chos so //
analyzed: yang na dngos po ste gzugs la sogs pa lnga dang / dngos med de chos so //
translated: Alternatively, things are the five such as form, and nonthings are phenomena.

original: gzhan ni dbang po'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni dbang po'o //
translated: The other is the sense faculties.

original: gang rnams de rnams ni brtan g-yo'o //
analyzed: gang rnams de rnams ni brtan g-yo'o //
translated: Those are the animate and inanimate.

original: rnam shes ni mig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam shes ni mig la sogs pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is the eye and so on.

original: kun gyi tshul ni gzugs la sogs pa de dag dang lhan cig skyes par snang ba'o //
analyzed: kun gyi tshul ni gzugs la sogs pa de dag dang lhan cig skyes par snang ba'o //
translated: The mode of all is the appearance of those forms and so on that arise simultaneously with it.

original: 'o na lhan cig skyes pa de nyid chos kun gyi rang bzhin yin na grub mtha' ngan pas brtags pa'i chos rnams su mi 'gyur rnam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na lhan cig skyes pa de nyid chos kun gyi rang bzhin yin na grub mtha' ngan pas brtags pa'i chos rnams su mi 'gyur rnam zhe na /
translated: Well then, if that coemergence is the nature of all phenomena, then it would not be the phenomena imputed by bad philosophical systems.

original: nyes pa med de skyes bu ni pu ru sha ste snod kyi 'jig rten du bcud kyis 'gengs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa med de skyes bu ni pu ru sha ste snod kyi 'jig rten du bcud kyis 'gengs par byed pa'o //
translated: There is no fault, because purusha is the person who fills the world-vessel with the contents.

original: sngon rabs ni bri ta ka ste phya'am mes po ste tshangs pa'o //
analyzed: sngon rabs ni bri ta ka ste phya'am mes po ste tshangs pa'o //
translated: Prior existence is bhrtaka, which is the father or grandfather, that is, Brahma.

original: dbang phyug ni ma he shva ra ste kun la dbang ba'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug ni ma he shva ra ste kun la dbang ba'i bdag po'o //
translated: Ishvara is maheshvara, the lord who is powerful over all.

original: dbang phyug chen po'am lha chen po zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po'am lha chen po zhes brjod do //
translated: He is called maheshvara or mahadeva.

original: bdag ni rtag pa'i khyad par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni rtag pa'i khyad par ldan pa'o //
translated: The self is the special quality of permanence.

original: gso ba ni 'dzin pa ste dbugs so //
analyzed: gso ba ni 'dzin pa ste dbugs so //
translated: Nourishment is the holding, that is, the breath.

original: sems can ni shes pa ste nus pa shes can no //
analyzed: sems can ni shes pa ste nus pa shes can no //
translated: Sentient beings are consciousness, that is, those who know how to act.

original: dus ni yon tan no //
analyzed: dus ni yon tan no //
translated: Time is the quality.

original: gang zag ni pung gal ste /
analyzed: gang zag ni pung gal ste /
translated: A person is a punggala,

original: byed pa po'am //
analyzed: byed pa po'am //
translated: the agent, or

original: las kyi 'bras bu gang zhig smin par 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi 'bras bu gang zhig smin par 'dzag pa'o //
translated: the one who ripens the result of karma.🔽 Those are not the only imputations,

original: de dag tu btags pa ma zad de /
analyzed: de dag tu btags pa ma zad de /
translated: because there are also the following:🔽 The self is the one who sees, the one who hears, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who understands, the one who does, the one who experiences, the one who is bound, and the one who is liberated.🔽 The self is the one who sees, the one who hears, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who understands, the one who does, the one who experiences, the one who is bound, and the one who is liberated.🔽 The self is the one who sees, the one who hears, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who understands, the one who does, the one who experiences, the one who is bound, and the one who is liberated.🔽 The self is the one who sees, the one who hears, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who understands, the one who does, the one who experiences, the one who is bound, and the one who is liberated.🔽 The self is the one who sees, the one who hears, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who understands, the one who does, the one who experiences, the one who is bound, and the one who is liberated.🔽 The self is the one who sees, the one who hears, the one who feels, the one who knows, the one who understands, the

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The nature of all things is up to nirvana.

original: sgyu ma'i tshul lam gzugs ni ma h'a m'a y'a ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i tshul lam gzugs ni ma h'a m'a y'a ste /
translated: The way of illusion is the form of Mahayoga.

original: bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma chen po'o //
analyzed: bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma chen po'o //
translated: It is the great illusion that is neither true nor false.

original: yang dag gnas ni zag pa med pa'i bde bar rang snang ba'o ;
analyzed: yang dag gnas ni zag pa med pa'i bde bar rang snang ba'o ;
translated: The right abode is the self-appearance of uncontaminated bliss.

original: / de'i phyir nyes pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: / de'i phyir nyes pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault at all.

original: da ni the tshom gyi yul bstan pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ji ltar nyams su blang ba'i thabs bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste go sla'o //
analyzed: da ni the tshom gyi yul bstan pa dang lhan cig skyes pa ji ltar nyams su blang ba'i thabs bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste go sla'o //
translated: Now, one verse on the teaching of the object of doubt and the method of practice of the connate, which is easy to understand.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje snying po ni sngon du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje snying po ni sngon du'o //
translated: The Tathagata and the vajra essence are first.

original: mkhas pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pa la'o //🔽@283a * // de skad des thos ni zag pa dang bcas pa chags pa las byung ba'am /
analyzed: mkhas pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pa la'o // @283a * // de skad des thos ni zag pa dang bcas pa chags pa las byung ba'am /
translated: The wise one is in the perfection of subsequent engagement.

original: zag pa'i bdag nyid du thos pa'o //
analyzed: zag pa'i bdag nyid du thos pa'o //
translated: Having heard that, the contaminated one arises from attachment or is heard as having the nature of contamination.

original: mchog tu ngo mtshar ni dman pa 'am spyod yul ma yin pas so //
analyzed: mchog tu ngo mtshar ni dman pa 'am spyod yul ma yin pas so //
translated: The supreme wonder is from the inferior or from the non-object-field.

original: brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel pa ni skrag pa'am che ba'i bdag nyid ston pa'o //
analyzed: brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel pa ni skrag pa'am che ba'i bdag nyid ston pa'o //
translated: The fainting and falling to the ground show fear or a sense of awe.

original: yang na brgyal ba ni sems kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: yang na brgyal ba ni sems kyi khyad par ro //
translated: Or, the fainting is a mental distinction,

original: 'gyel ba ni lus kyi bkod pa'o /
analyzed: 'gyel ba ni lus kyi bkod pa'o /
translated: and the falling is a physical posture.

original: 'dir dga' ba'i grangs la the tshom skyes pa ltar bstan kyang don la dbang bzhi pa la the tshom skyes te /
analyzed: 'dir dga' ba'i grangs la the tshom skyes pa ltar bstan kyang don la dbang bzhi pa la the tshom skyes te /
translated: Here, although it is shown as if doubt arises about the number of joys, in fact, doubt arises about the fourth empowerment.

original: shin tu zab pas spyod yul ma yin par dogs pa dang / yang na shin tu dman pas ngan pa ru rtog pa skyes pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu zab pas spyod yul ma yin par dogs pa dang / yang na shin tu dman pas ngan pa ru rtog pa skyes pa'o //
translated: Or, doubt arises about the inferior because of being extremely low.

original: da ni de dag gi rgyu mtshan sems la gnas pa'i so sor brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de dag gi rgyu mtshan sems la gnas pa'i so sor brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to state individually the reasons for those,

original: dang po dga' ba 'gro ba ni brtag pa'o //
analyzed: dang po dga' ba 'gro ba ni brtag pa'o //
translated: first, the joy is the going or investigation.

original: mchog dga' 'gro ba'am brtag pas te 'khor bar ro //
analyzed: mchog dga' 'gro ba'am brtag pas te 'khor bar ro //
translated: The supreme joy is the going or investigation of samsara.

original: dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba'am brtag pa ste mya ngan las 'das par ro //
analyzed: dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba'am brtag pa ste mya ngan las 'das par ro //
translated: The joy of separation from joy is also the going or investigation, which is nirvana.

original: de na 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gro bas ngo mtshar ba'am brgyal ba'o //
analyzed: de na 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gro bas ngo mtshar ba'am brgyal ba'o //
translated: There, since one goes to the end of samsara and nirvana, there is amazement or fainting.

original: yang na zab pa che ba'i bdag nyid dga' ba gsum gyis mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: yang na zab pa che ba'i bdag nyid dga' ba gsum gyis mi rtog pa'o //
translated: Or else, it is the non-conceptual state of the three joys, which is the nature of the great profundity.

original: spyod yul ma yin par dgos na ngo mtshar zhing brgyal ba'o //
analyzed: spyod yul ma yin par dgos na ngo mtshar zhing brgyal ba'o //
translated: If it is the case that it is not an object of experience, then it is amazing and fainting.🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / dga' ba gsum la lhan skyes med //
analyzed: de'i phyir / dga' ba gsum la lhan skyes med //
translated: there is no connate joy in the three joys.

original: ces pa'o // da ni the tshom bsal ba'i phyir sdud par byed pas /
analyzed: ces pa'o // da ni the tshom bsal ba'i phyir sdud par byed pas /
translated: Now, in order to remove doubts, the compiler says:

original: bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rdo rje //
analyzed: bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rdo rje //
translated: O Bhagavān, Vajra of Speech,

original: zhes pa'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig ni bde ba chen po'i sku'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig ni bde ba chen po'i sku'o //
translated: the single body of all buddhas is the body of great bliss.

original: rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya ni sngon byung dag go //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya ni sngon byung dag go //
translated: The vajra essence is to be realized by the past events.

original: the tshom ni dman pa'am spyod yul ma yin pa gong du brjod pa nyid do //
analyzed: the tshom ni dman pa'am spyod yul ma yin pa gong du brjod pa nyid do //
translated: Doubt is the inferior or nonobject of experience that was mentioned above.

original: bzang ba'am legs par sel ba ni las len pa'o //
analyzed: bzang ba'am legs par sel ba ni las len pa'o //
translated: Good or excellent removal is the function.

original: ci zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

analyzed: phyugs ni dud 'gro'i gtso bo ste klu'o //

analyzed: sngags pa grangs nyung ba ni 'gro ba gcig pa dang / dam tshig gis brtse ba'i phyir ro //

original: brtag pa ni cho ga zhi ba mo'o /
