analyzed: le'u bcu gcig pa ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The eleventh chapter is the remainder.

original: brtag pa dang po rdzogs so /
analyzed: brtag pa dang po rdzogs so /
translated: The first analysis is complete.

original: // / da ni brtag pa phyi mar bstan pa'i don bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / da ni brtag pa phyi mar bstan pa'i don bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the meaning taught in the subsequent analyses,

original: rdo rje snying pos gsol zhes pa ni mkha' @288a * //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsol zhes pa ni mkha' @288a * //
translated: it says “Vajragarbha made a request,” and so on.

original: 'gro ma rnams dang so sor bsdams pa'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: 'gro ma rnams dang so sor bsdams pa'i tshul gyis so //
translated: The sky-farers are the yoginīs, and the individual commitments are the modes of conduct.

original: bcom ldan rdo rje ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan rdo rje ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The blessed vajra is Vajradhara.

original: snying po ni sa ra ste bcud du bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: snying po ni sa ra ste bcud du bsdus pa'o //
translated: The essence is the essence, the condensed quintessence.

original: bdag ni bdag nyid dam bdag po kye'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: bdag ni bdag nyid dam bdag po kye'i rdo rje'o //
translated: I am myself, or the lord Hevajra.

original: de nas bshad du gsol zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: de nas bshad du gsol zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: Then, please explain is connected.

original: yang na sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'o //
translated: Or, it is the compendium of all buddhas.

original: snying po ni bcud du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: snying po ni bcud du gyur pa'o //
translated: The essence is the concentrated essence.

original: rab gnas kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rab gnas kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is the characteristic of consecration.

original: de bshad du gsol zhes par 'brel lo //
analyzed: de bshad du gsol zhes par 'brel lo //
translated: Please explain is connected.

original: de'i don ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di yin no //
translated: The meaning of that is this.

original: rab tu gnas pa yang sngon du bsnyen pa bya ste /
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa yang sngon du bsnyen pa bya ste /
translated: Also, consecration is preceded by approach.

original: rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son //
analyzed: rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son //
translated: Having seen well, one perfects mantra.

original: zhes bya ba ni de yang yan lag drug gam ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis byas la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de yang yan lag drug gam ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis byas la /
translated: This is also done by the six-branched yoga or the three samadhis.

original: de yang gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang gsum ste /
translated: That also has three types:

original: grangs kyi bsnyen pa 'bum dang khri //
analyzed: grangs kyi bsnyen pa 'bum dang khri //
translated: The approach of number is one hundred thousand or ten thousand.

original: gtso dang 'khor ni tshang bar bya //
analyzed: gtso dang 'khor ni tshang bar bya //
translated: The principal and retinue are completed.

original: dus kyi bsnyen pa zla ba drug goms pa la sogs pa ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: dus kyi bsnyen pa zla ba drug goms pa la sogs pa ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
translated: The approach of time is six months. Familiarity and so on should be understood as appropriate.

original: mtshan ma ni lhas gnang ba 'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma ni lhas gnang ba 'am /
translated: The sign is permission by the deity.

original: rmi lam gyi bar du bzang po 'byung ba dang / slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la /
analyzed: rmi lam gyi bar du bzang po 'byung ba dang / slob dpon mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la /
translated: and good dreams occur.

original: lan gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: lan gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: One should supplicate the qualified master two or three times.

original: sngar sa'i cho ga yang le'u bcu pa ltar bya ste /
analyzed: sngar sa'i cho ga yang le'u bcu pa ltar bya ste /
translated: Also, the earth ritual should be done as in chapter 10.

original: de'i sngon du bgegs bsal ba'i don du ci gsungs sbyin sreg byas nas zhes pa cho ga bzhin bya'o //
analyzed: de'i sngon du bgegs bsal ba'i don du ci gsungs sbyin sreg byas nas zhes pa cho ga bzhin bya'o //
translated: Prior to that, one should perform the fire sacrifice as stated for the purpose of dispelling obstructors and then do the rite.

original: sta gon la sogs byas nas ni /
analyzed: sta gon la sogs byas nas ni /
translated: Having performed the setup and so on,

original: bya ba bdag nyid la ldan pa phun sum tshogs par bya ba ni yan lag drug gam sbyor ba gsum byas na /
analyzed: bya ba bdag nyid la ldan pa phun sum tshogs par bya ba ni yan lag drug gam sbyor ba gsum byas na /
translated: if one performs the six-branched yoga or the three-part yoga,

original: de nas sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas pa ni rlung mtshams su mandalaa cig byas la me tog gi tshom bu cig bkram ste /
analyzed: de nas sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas pa ni rlung mtshams su mandalaa cig byas la me tog gi tshom bu cig bkram ste /
translated: then the consecration of the earth goddess is as follows: Having made a single maṇḍala in the southwest and scattered a bouquet of flowers,

original: pam las bum pa de las sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser ba g-yas pas khas len pa g-yon pas bum pa bsnams pa cig bskyed de /
analyzed: pam las bum pa de las sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser ba g-yas pas khas len pa g-yon pas bum pa bsnams pa cig bskyed de /
translated: one generates the earth goddess from a vase marked with paṃ, yellow in color, holding a vessel in her right hand and a vase in her left hand.

original: rang bzhin pa spyan drangs nas mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: rang bzhin pa spyan drangs nas mchod pa byas nas /
translated: Having invited the natural [goddess], one should make offerings.

original: ma ma rin chen zhes bya ba dang / sa dang pha rol phyin pa zhes pa gzhan nas byung ba dang tshig gnyis kyis dbang por gsol pa /
analyzed: ma ma rin chen zhes bya ba dang / sa dang pha rol phyin pa zhes pa gzhan nas byung ba dang tshig gnyis kyis dbang por gsol pa /
translated: The two lines “the nurse named Ratnā” and “the one named Bhūmi and Pāramitā” are supplicating the sense powers.

original: bstim pa'am yang na dbang por bzhugs so //
analyzed: bstim pa'am yang na dbang por bzhugs so //
translated: They dissolve or remain in the sense powers.

original: lha lhag par gnas pa ni dkyil 'khor khang pa'am gzhan du mandala sbyor ba lngas byugs la /
analyzed: lha lhag par gnas pa ni dkyil 'khor khang pa'am gzhan du mandala sbyor ba lngas byugs la /
translated: The special deity abides in the maṇḍala house or elsewhere, on a maṇḍala smeared with the five elixirs.

original: gtso bo'i gnas su dri'i thig le gru bzhi bya /
analyzed: gtso bo'i gnas su dri'i thig le gru bzhi bya /
translated: In the place of the principal figure, make a square water drop of scent.

original: gzhan la zlum po bya /
analyzed: gzhan la zlum po bya /
translated: In the others, make a circle.

original: padma dang zla ba bsams la me tog tshom bu rang rang gi sngags bzlas shing lha mor mos la /
analyzed: padma dang zla ba bsams la me tog tshom bu rang rang gi sngags bzlas shing lha mor mos la /
translated: Having visualized a lotus and moon, recite the individual mantras over heaps of flowers and imagine them to be goddesses.

original: de la mar me dang lha bshos la sogs pa bkram ste /
analyzed: de la mar me dang lha bshos la sogs pa bkram ste /
translated: Arrange the lamps, bali offerings, and so on.

original: slob dpon gyis sa bon tsam @288b ma ma phyag mtshan las lhar bskyed la /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis sa bon tsam @288b ma ma phyag mtshan las lhar bskyed la /
translated: The master generates the deities from the seed syllables and hand implements.

original: ye shes 'khor lo mdun du bkug pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pa byas la dgug gzhug la sogs pa bya /
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo mdun du bkug pa la bla na med pa'i mchod pa byas la dgug gzhug la sogs pa bya /
translated: Having summoned the wheel of awareness in front, make unsurpassed offerings and perform the summoning, inducting, and so on.

original: de la skye mched byin gyis brlab pa dang / sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab dbang bskur mchod bstod bdud rtsi myangs nas bzlas pa mthar thug pa'i bar du byas la /
analyzed: de la skye mched byin gyis brlab pa dang / sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab dbang bskur mchod bstod bdud rtsi myangs nas bzlas pa mthar thug pa'i bar du byas la /
translated: In that, there is the consecration of the sense bases, the consecration of body, speech, and mind, the conferral of empowerment, offering, praise, tasting the elixir, and concluding the recitation.

original: rab gnas kyi don du tshig bsgyur la bya'o //
analyzed: rab gnas kyi don du tshig bsgyur la bya'o //
translated: For the purpose of consecration, one should do the recitation of the mantra.

original: de nas bum pa dang / yo byad kun lhag par gnas pa bya /
analyzed: de nas bum pa dang / yo byad kun lhag par gnas pa bya /
translated: Then, one should consecrate the vase and all the articles.

original: de nas yon bdag slob ma dbang bskur nas /
analyzed: de nas yon bdag slob ma dbang bskur nas /
translated: Then, having conferred empowerment on the benefactors and disciples,

original: sta gon zangs kyis bya /
analyzed: sta gon zangs kyis bya /
translated: one should perform the setup.

original: mi bskur na sbyang ba dang / spro ba bskyed pa tsam bya'o //
analyzed: mi bskur na sbyang ba dang / spro ba bskyed pa tsam bya'o //
translated: If one does not confer empowerment, one should just perform the purification and the arousing of delight.

original: de nas rab tu gnas pa la /
analyzed: de nas rab tu gnas pa la /
translated: Then, for the consecration,

original: snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang / zhes bya ba ni sta gon byed pa dang nyin gcig par bya ba'o //
analyzed: snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang / zhes bya ba ni sta gon byed pa dang nyin gcig par bya ba'o //
translated: the purification of the image means performing the setup and doing it on the same day.

original: sta gon byed pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: sta gon byed pa ni gnyis te /
translated: There are two in performing the setup:

original: rten sbyang ba dang / mgon po bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: rten sbyang ba dang / mgon po bsdu ba'o //
translated: the purification of the receptacle and the gathering of the protectors.

original: rten sbyang ba ni stegs bu khru gang dpangs su khru phyed pa'i steng du sku gzugs gral nas phyung la /
analyzed: rten sbyang ba ni stegs bu khru gang dpangs su khru phyed pa'i steng du sku gzugs gral nas phyung la /
translated: For the purification of the receptacle, the image is removed from its place on a platform one cubit high and half a cubit wide.

original: sbyang ba lnga ni dang po khrus kyis sbyang ste /
analyzed: sbyang ba lnga ni dang po khrus kyis sbyang ste /
translated: The five purifications are as follows: First, purification by bathing.

original: 'dag chal la sogs pas bkrus te /
analyzed: 'dag chal la sogs pas bkrus te /
translated: Wash with soap and so forth.

original: de nas me'i nang du yungs kar blugs shing sbyang ba'i sngags bzlas shing bskor zhing bya'o //
analyzed: de nas me'i nang du yungs kar blugs shing sbyang ba'i sngags bzlas shing bskor zhing bya'o //
translated: Then, put mustard seed in the fire, and do the purification mantra recitation while circling.

original: de nas chu'i nang du snga ma bzhin bya'o //
analyzed: de nas chu'i nang du snga ma bzhin bya'o //
translated: Then, do as before in the water.

original: de nas brtsva d'ur bas sbyang ngo //
analyzed: de nas brtsva d'ur bas sbyang ngo //
translated: Then, purify with a bundle of kuśa grass.

original: de nas shun pa lngas dril phyis bya'o //
analyzed: de nas shun pa lngas dril phyis bya'o //
translated: Then, wipe with the five types of bark.

original: de dag med na ba byung lnga dang / 'bru mar bskus la bag phyes dril phyis bya'o //
analyzed: de dag med na ba byung lnga dang / 'bru mar bskus la bag phyes dril phyis bya'o //
translated: If those are not available, wipe with a cloth soaked in the five products of the cow and sesame oil.

original: de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa nas khrus bya /
analyzed: de nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa nas khrus bya /
translated: Then, bathe with the vase of all activities.

original: bkra shis gdon zhing byabs la sku phyis la sbyang ngo //
analyzed: bkra shis gdon zhing byabs la sku phyis la sbyang ngo //
translated: Recite the benediction, sprinkle, and wipe the body.

original: ras ris dang mchod rten dang lha khang la me long la khrus bya'o //
analyzed: ras ris dang mchod rten dang lha khang la me long la khrus bya'o //
translated: For a painting, stūpa, or temple, bathe with a mirror.

original: de nas mgon po bsdu ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mgon po bsdu ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan drangs la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: Then, the dissolution of the lord is as follows: Invite all the buddhas and bodhisattvas, make offerings and praises, and make supplications.

original: de nas nang par snga bar dbang bskur na rmi lam dris kha sbyor nam mkha' la bteg la /
analyzed: de nas nang par snga bar dbang bskur na rmi lam dris kha sbyor nam mkha' la bteg la /
translated: Then, if the empowerment is conferred in the early morning, the dream is asked about. The union is lifted into space.

original: thig dang tshon dang kha sbyar dbab pa bsre'o //
analyzed: thig dang tshon dang kha sbyar dbab pa bsre'o //
translated: The lines, colors, and the descent of the union are mixed.

original: de nas rgyan da gram bum pa dgod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rgyan da gram bum pa dgod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: Then, the ornaments, the vases, and so on are arranged.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni yan lag drug gam sbyor ba gsum gyi bdag nyid la ldan pa phun sum tshogs pa las kyi slob mas byas la bla ma la mos pa 'pho bar bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni yan lag drug gam sbyor ba gsum gyi bdag nyid la ldan pa phun sum tshogs pa las kyi slob mas byas la bla ma la mos pa 'pho bar bsgoms nas /
translated: Then, the accomplishment of the maṇḍala is performed by the assistant, who has the perfect qualities of the six limbs or the three yogas, and having meditated on the transference of devotion to the guru,

original: sa bon phyag mtshan tsam las lha bskyed /
analyzed: sa bon phyag mtshan tsam las lha bskyed /
translated: the deity is generated from the mere seed and hand implement.

original: rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs pa bsres la mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs pa bsres la mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya'o //
translated: Having mixed the invited deity with the intrinsic one, the offerings, praises, and tasting of elixir are performed.🔽Then, there are four topics for the inner abiding:

original: de nas nang du gnas pa ni bzhi ste rab tu gnas pa dang / @289a * //
analyzed: de nas nang du gnas pa ni bzhi ste rab tu gnas pa dang / @289a * //
translated: the consecration,🔽the offering of dominion,🔽the opening of the eyes,

original: mnga' dbul ba dang / spyan dbye ba dang / zhal bsro ba'o //
analyzed: mnga' dbul ba dang / spyan dbye ba dang / zhal bsro ba'o //
translated: and the burnt offering.

original: rab gnas la gnyis te /
analyzed: rab gnas la gnyis te /
translated: There are two topics in the consecration:

original: thun mong dang khyad par gyi rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong dang khyad par gyi rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: the common consecration and the special consecration.

original: de la thun mong ni sbyang ba lnga po dang mgon po bsdus pa la tshig bsgyur la bya /
analyzed: de la thun mong ni sbyang ba lnga po dang mgon po bsdus pa la tshig bsgyur la bya /
translated: The common empowerment is conferred by means of the five awakenings and the condensed protector.

original: nyin gcig pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: nyin gcig pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: It is similar to the one-day rite.

original: de la rten rang rang gi lha gang yin par bskyed /
analyzed: de la rten rang rang gi lha gang yin par bskyed /
translated: In that, generate the support as whichever deity is appropriate.

original: mi gsal na lhag pa'i lhar bskyed /
analyzed: mi gsal na lhag pa'i lhar bskyed /
translated: If it is unclear, generate it as the excellent deity.

original: po ti la sngags ni aa las rdo rje chos su /
analyzed: po ti la sngags ni aa las rdo rje chos su /
translated: The mantra for the books is “from aḥ, Vajradharma.”

original: mdo sde ni snang ba mtha' yas su /
analyzed: mdo sde ni snang ba mtha' yas su /
translated: The sūtra is “Amitābha.”

original: yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mar pra las bskyed /🔽mchod rten nam gtsug lag khang ni bhr'um las gzhal yas khang ngam /
analyzed: yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mar pra las bskyed / mchod rten nam gtsug lag khang ni bhr'um las gzhal yas khang ngam /
translated: The mother is “from pra, perfection of wisdom.”

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mar bskyed /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mar bskyed /
translated: The stūpa or temple is “from bhrūṃ, celestial mansion” or “from bhrūṃ, Vajradhātvīśvarī.”

original: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams /
analyzed: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams /
translated: The buddhas residing in the sky

original: sku gzugs snying gar rab tu gzhug //
analyzed: sku gzugs snying gar rab tu gzhug //
translated: are inserted into the heart of the image.

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni /
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni /
translated: Just as all buddhas

original: dga' ldan gnas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dga' ldan gnas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: in the place called Tuṣhita

original: sngar gyi sta gon nam mkhar spyan drangs pa bstim pa tsam byas te /
analyzed: sngar gyi sta gon nam mkhar spyan drangs pa bstim pa tsam byas te /
translated: merely dissolve the previously invoked empowerment deities in the space above.

original: byin gyis brlab /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab /
translated: Consecrate.

original: dbang bskur / mchod bstod byas la bzhugs so //
analyzed: dbang bskur / mchod bstod byas la bzhugs so //
translated: Confer the empowerment, make offerings and praises, and then remain.

original: khyad par gyi rab gnas ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams bstims la yang snga ma bzhin bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi rab gnas ni dkyil 'khor ba rnams bstims la yang snga ma bzhin bya'o //
translated: The special consecration is to dissolve the maṇḍala deities, and do as before.

original: spyan dbye ba ni gnyis te /
analyzed: spyan dbye ba ni gnyis te /
translated: There are two in the eye-opening:

original: thun mong spyan dbye ni gser gyi thur ma la tshigs bcad dangs sngags kyis bya /
analyzed: thun mong spyan dbye ni gser gyi thur ma la tshigs bcad dangs sngags kyis bya /
translated: The common eye-opening is to open the eyes with a golden scalpel and the essence mantra.

original: khyad par spyan dbye ni ye shes dbab pa zhal bzhad pa'am sku ldeg pa'am /
analyzed: khyad par spyan dbye ni ye shes dbab pa zhal bzhad pa'am sku ldeg pa'am /
translated: The special eye-opening is to open the eyes until the descent of awareness, the face smiles, the body shakes,

original: snyan cha 'khrol ba'am sa g-yo ba'i bar du bya'o //
analyzed: snyan cha 'khrol ba'am sa g-yo ba'i bar du bya'o //
translated: the earrings jingle, or the earth shakes.

original: mnga' dbul ba la gnyis te /
analyzed: mnga' dbul ba la gnyis te /
translated: There are two in the offering of dominion:

original: lha ltar mchod pa dang / slob ma ltar dbang bskur ba'o //🔽mchod pa ni mchod pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa rgyal po gcig gi yo byad de /
analyzed: lha ltar mchod pa dang / slob ma ltar dbang bskur ba'o // mchod pa ni mchod pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa rgyal po gcig gi yo byad de /
translated: offering like a god and conferring empowerment like a disciple.

original: gdugs dang ba dan la sogs pa dang spos dang me tog la sogs pa brgya bas lhag cing bcu las mi nyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gdugs dang ba dan la sogs pa dang spos dang me tog la sogs pa brgya bas lhag cing bcu las mi nyung bar bya'o //
translated: For the offering, the special offering is the articles of a single king, more than one hundred and not less than ten, such as parasols, banners, and so on, incense, flowers, and so on.

original: ras yug brgya'am stong ngam pa lang gi khyu brtags pa dang / rin po chen che sna bdun la sogs pa 'bul lo //
analyzed: ras yug brgya'am stong ngam pa lang gi khyu brtags pa dang / rin po chen che sna bdun la sogs pa 'bul lo //
translated: One should offer a hundred or a thousand pieces of cloth, a herd of cattle, the seven precious articles of the king, and so forth.

original: slob ma ltar dbang bskur ba ni chu nas brtsams nas rig pa'i dbang dang brtul zhugs dang rjes su gnang ba dang / lung bstan pa la sogs pa mchod gnas su gtad pa shis pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma ltar dbang bskur ba ni chu nas brtsams nas rig pa'i dbang dang brtul zhugs dang rjes su gnang ba dang / lung bstan pa la sogs pa mchod gnas su gtad pa shis pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: The consecration of the disciple is the bestowal of the water initiation and so forth, the knowledge initiation, the observances, the permission, the prophecy, and so forth, and the entrustment to the worship place.

original: zhal bsro ba ni rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gam shis pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: zhal bsro ba ni rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gam shis pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: The consecration of the house is the prosperity fire offering or the auspicious fire offering.

original: dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / yul khrims kyis shis pa'i ston mo bya /
analyzed: dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / yul khrims kyis shis pa'i ston mo bya /
translated: One should make offerings to the community and have an auspicious feast with the local laws.

original: nad pa yin na tshogs kyi mchod pa dang ts'a ru'i ston mo bya'o //
analyzed: nad pa yin na tshogs kyi mchod pa dang ts'a ru'i ston mo bya'o //
translated: If one is sick, one should make the offering of the assembly and the feast of Caru.

original: gtsug lag khang yin na nag po chen po @289b bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang yin na nag po chen po @289b bsgom par bya ste /
translated: If it is a temple, one should meditate on Mahakala.

original: rten yod pa'i drung du phyin la mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la /
analyzed: rten yod pa'i drung du phyin la mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la /
translated: Having gone in front of the image, one should set out the offerings and the sacrificial cake.

original: dang por rang bskyed rang bzhin pa bstims la byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
analyzed: dang por rang bskyed rang bzhin pa bstims la byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
translated: First, one should dissolve the self-generation into the natural [state] and perform the consecration.

original: mchod bstod byas la bka' bsgo ba bya /
analyzed: mchod bstod byas la bka' bsgo ba bya /
translated: Having made offerings and praises, one should give the command.

original: 'di rnams kyi cho ga ni lag tu blang ba'i rim par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi cho ga ni lag tu blang ba'i rim par shes par bya'o //
translated: The ritual of these [deities] should be understood in the stages of practice.

original: la la ni rab tu gnas pa'i lha ni gshegs su gsol bar 'dod do //
analyzed: la la ni rab tu gnas pa'i lha ni gshegs su gsol bar 'dod do //
translated: Some wish to request the departure of the deity of consecration.

original: bla ma ni sku gzugs la sogs par phal cher ni mi gshegs so //
analyzed: bla ma ni sku gzugs la sogs par phal cher ni mi gshegs so //
translated: The guru does not depart from the image, etc.

original: rten khyad par can ma yin pa la ni lan cig byin gyis brlab pa tsam byas la gshegs so //
analyzed: rten khyad par can ma yin pa la ni lan cig byin gyis brlab pa tsam byas la gshegs so //
translated: Having merely blessed once the non-special support, [the deity] departs.

original: brtag pa phyi ma 'di ni mngon par rtogs pas mi 'ching ste /
analyzed: brtag pa phyi ma 'di ni mngon par rtogs pas mi 'ching ste /
translated: This latter analysis is not bound by realization,

original: brtag pa snga ma'i yan lag tu ston te /
analyzed: brtag pa snga ma'i yan lag tu ston te /
translated: but is taught as a branch of the former analysis.

original: de yang rab tu gnas pa ni le'u bcu pa'i ma tshang ba 'di yis kha bskang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rab tu gnas pa ni le'u bcu pa'i ma tshang ba 'di yis kha bskang bar bya'o //
translated: Moreover, consecration is supplemented by this incompleteness of the tenth chapter.

original: le'u gnyis pa ni brtag pa snga ma'i rim pa gnyis spyir shes par bya ba nyams su blangs /
analyzed: le'u gnyis pa ni brtag pa snga ma'i rim pa gnyis spyir shes par bya ba nyams su blangs /
translated: The second chapter is to be generally understood as the two stages of the former analysis, practiced,

original: nyams su blangs pa'i 'bras bu tshul gyis gtan la 'bebs so //
analyzed: nyams su blangs pa'i 'bras bu tshul gyis gtan la 'bebs so //
translated: and the result of practice is determined by the method.

original: le'u gsum pa ni gling gzhi'i don du gtan la 'bebs so //
analyzed: le'u gsum pa ni gling gzhi'i don du gtan la 'bebs so //
translated: Chapter three is for the sake of the ground mandala.

original: le'u bzhi pas ni kha 'thong gyi don dka' ba gtan la 'bebs so //
analyzed: le'u bzhi pas ni kha 'thong gyi don dka' ba gtan la 'bebs so //
translated: Chapter four is for the sake of the difficult topic of the open mouth.

original: le'u lnga pas ni he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor le'u gsum pa dang / bcu pa'i ma tshang ba gtan la 'bebs so //
analyzed: le'u lnga pas ni he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor le'u gsum pa dang / bcu pa'i ma tshang ba gtan la 'bebs so //
translated: Chapter five is for the sake of the mandala of the manifest realization of the sixteen-armed Heruka, the incomplete third chapter of the colored-powder mandala, and the tenth chapter.

original: drug pa bdun pa gnyis kyis spyir bris sku dang glegs bam la brten nas sngar tshogs kyi 'khor lo ma bstan pa 'dir gtan la 'bebs so //
analyzed: drug pa bdun pa gnyis kyis spyir bris sku dang glegs bam la brten nas sngar tshogs kyi 'khor lo ma bstan pa 'dir gtan la 'bebs so //
translated: The sixth and seventh chapters are for the sake of the general feast gathering not previously taught in this tantra in dependence on a painted image and a book.

original: le'u brgyad pas ni 'jug pa'i gang zag dad pa can dang gdul bar dka' ba'i thabs rgyud 'dir 'jug pa'i thabs ston to //
analyzed: le'u brgyad pas ni 'jug pa'i gang zag dad pa can dang gdul bar dka' ba'i thabs rgyud 'dir 'jug pa'i thabs ston to //
translated: Chapter eight is for the sake of the method of engaging the faithful person and the difficult-to-tame person in this tantra.

original: dgu pas ni bgrang phreng dang las so so'i bza' ba'i dam tshig bstan to //
analyzed: dgu pas ni bgrang phreng dang las so so'i bza' ba'i dam tshig bstan to //
translated: Chapter nine is for the sake of the rosary and the individual action food commitments.

original: bcu pa dang bcu gcig pas ni zhe sdang can dang / chags pa can rgyud 'dir 'jug pa'i tshul lam thabs bstan to //
analyzed: bcu pa dang bcu gcig pas ni zhe sdang can dang / chags pa can rgyud 'dir 'jug pa'i tshul lam thabs bstan to //
translated: The tenth and eleventh chapters teach the method or means for engaging in this tantra for those who are hateful and those who are lustful.

original: bcu gnyis pas ni dbang bzhi'i sdom gyi tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad sngar ma gsungs pa'i kha skong bstan to //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pas ni dbang bzhi'i sdom gyi tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad sngar ma gsungs pa'i kha skong bstan to //
translated: The twelfth chapter teaches the summary verses of the four initiations and supplements the verses on conferring initiation that were not previously taught.

original: rang gnas kyi le'i bshad pa ste dang / po'o //
analyzed: rang gnas kyi le'i bshad pa ste dang / po'o //
translated: This completes the first chapter of the commentary on the chapter on the natural location.

original: da ni brtag pa snga ma'i rim pa gnyis kyis thob pa'i thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa phyag rgya chen po ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: da ni brtag pa snga ma'i rim pa gnyis kyis thob pa'i thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa phyag rgya chen po ji lta zhe na /
translated: Now, how is the great seal, the indivisibility of method and wisdom obtained by the two stages of the former investigation?

original: de'i phyir rdo rje snying pos dris pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje snying pos dris pa'o //
translated: Therefore, Vajragarbha asks.

original: chos kun zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: chos kun zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: All phenomena refers to the nature of form and so forth.

original: nam mkha' lta bu ni shes rab zab mo'i dpe'o //🔽rgya mtsho lta bu la ni lhag ma ste thabs @290a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu ni shes rab zab mo'i dpe'o // rgya mtsho lta bu la ni lhag ma ste thabs @290a * //
translated: Like space is an example of profound wisdom.

original: zab pa'i dpe'o //
analyzed: zab pa'i dpe'o //
translated: Like the ocean is an example of the profound method.

original: de yang rim pa gnyis kyi don ni zab pa ste dbyer med pa yin na /
analyzed: de yang rim pa gnyis kyi don ni zab pa ste dbyer med pa yin na /
translated: Moreover, if the meaning of the two stages is profound, it is indivisible.

original: bskyed rim sku zhes pa ste ril po'i mtshan ma'i //
analyzed: bskyed rim sku zhes pa ste ril po'i mtshan ma'i //
translated: The generation stage is the “body” of the sign of the whole.

original: ji ltar ram de bzhin zhes pa ni dpe'o //
analyzed: ji ltar ram de bzhin zhes pa ni dpe'o //
translated: “ Just like that” is the example.

original: rang 'dod lha'i gzugs ni lhag pa'i lha'o //
analyzed: rang 'dod lha'i gzugs ni lhag pa'i lha'o //
translated: One’s desired deity form is the excellent deity.

original: sems can gzugs bsgom pa /
analyzed: sems can gzugs bsgom pa /
translated: Meditating on the form of sentient beings.

original: ji ltar bsgrub ni phyag rgya chen po ste spong ba'i sgra'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrub ni phyag rgya chen po ste spong ba'i sgra'o //
translated: How to accomplish is the great seal, the word of abandonment.

original: yang na thabs de zhu 'tshal zhes zhus pa'o //
analyzed: yang na thabs de zhu 'tshal zhes zhus pa'o //
translated: Or, “please teach that method.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i lan du'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i lan du'o //
translated: It is the reply of the Bhagavān.

original: bdag med rnal 'byor ni chos kyi sku shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med rnal 'byor ni chos kyi sku shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The yoga of selflessness is the wisdom of the dharmakāya.

original: he ru ka dpal ni longs sku thabs so //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal ni longs sku thabs so //
translated: Śrī Heruka is the method of the saṃbhogakāya.

original: gzhan pa'i sems ni shes rab dang thabs ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan pa'i sems ni shes rab dang thabs ma yin pa'o //
translated: Other minds are not wisdom and method.

original: skad cig kyang ni yul tsam du yang ngo //
analyzed: skad cig kyang ni yul tsam du yang ngo //
translated: Even for a moment, not even an object.

original: dngos grub 'dod pa ni phyag rgya chen po dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pa ni phyag rgya chen po dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Desiring spiritual powers is because the great seal is inseparable.

original: mi gnas pa ni gzhan pa'i sems so //
analyzed: mi gnas pa ni gzhan pa'i sems so //
translated: Not abiding is the other mind.

original: da ni bstan pa de bshad pa'i phyir yang dang po goms par byed dus ni bzang por rtag tu 'brel te /
analyzed: da ni bstan pa de bshad pa'i phyir yang dang po goms par byed dus ni bzang por rtag tu 'brel te /
translated: Now, in order to explain that teaching, he says, “At the beginning, when one is cultivating, one is always connected to a good time,

original: las smin cing byang ba la yang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: las smin cing byang ba la yang ma yin pa'o //
translated: not when the karma is ripening and purifying.

original: gnas kyang sngags pa ni bde ba skyed pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'o /
analyzed: gnas kyang sngags pa ni bde ba skyed pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'o /
translated: The place is where the mantra practitioner generates bliss, as will be explained.

original: sems gcig mnyam gzhag ni de'i yon tan no //
analyzed: sems gcig mnyam gzhag ni de'i yon tan no //
translated: “The mind is single-pointed equipoise,” which is its quality.

original: gnas bzang po ni des yon tan bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas bzang po ni des yon tan bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “The good place” is where the qualities are generated.

original: rang khyims ni rnal 'byor pa'i'o //
analyzed: rang khyims ni rnal 'byor pa'i'o //
translated: “One’s own home” is the place of the yogin.

original: mtshan dus ni ne se ga la ste dus sam dus mtshan ma rgyu ba'i gnas so //
analyzed: mtshan dus ni ne se ga la ste dus sam dus mtshan ma rgyu ba'i gnas so //
translated: “Night” is the time of the movement of the constellations.

original: grub pa'i sems ni phyag rgya chen po la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i sems ni phyag rgya chen po la dmigs pa'o //
translated: “The mind of accomplishment” is the focus on mahāmudrā.

original: rnal 'byor ma bsgom ni 'dod pa'i lha bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma bsgom ni 'dod pa'i lha bdag med pa'o //
translated: “Not meditating on yoginīs” is the absence of desire for goddesses.

original: shes rab can ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: shes rab can ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: “The wise” are like space.

original: yang na ni 'dod pa'i lha mos phyogs gzhan du'o //
analyzed: yang na ni 'dod pa'i lha mos phyogs gzhan du'o //
translated: Alternatively, “the wise” are goddesses who are desired in other directions.

original: he ru ka dpal ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: “Śrī Heruka” is Hevajra.

original: de yang la la dag phyag bcu drug pa kho na la 'dod do //
analyzed: de yang la la dag phyag bcu drug pa kho na la 'dod do //
translated: Moreover, some assert that he has sixteen hands.

original: 'dir ni rdo rje bdag med ma dang gnyis kyis myur ba nyid du phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod de /
analyzed: 'dir ni rdo rje bdag med ma dang gnyis kyis myur ba nyid du phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod de /
translated: Here, one who desires to quickly accomplish the Great Seal by means of Vajra Nairatmya and the two

original: 'o na lha gzhan dag gis ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na lha gzhan dag gis ma yin zhe na /
translated: . But not by means of other deities?

original: gzhan dag gis ni myur ba nyid du phyag rgya chen po thob pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis ni myur ba nyid du phyag rgya chen po thob pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the Great Seal is quickly attained by means of others,

original: so sor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so sor nges pa'i phyir /
analyzed: so sor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so sor nges pa'i phyir /
translated: because of the definite individual dependence of each.

original: s'a lu la sogs pa'i sa bon bzhin no ;
analyzed: s'a lu la sogs pa'i sa bon bzhin no ;
translated: It is like the seed of rice, etc.

original: / ji skad du yang /
analyzed: / ji skad du yang /
translated: And it is also said:

original: 'jam dpal gyis ni blo 'phel byed //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis ni blo 'phel byed //
translated: Manjusri increases the intellect,

original: so sor 'brang ma byis pa sun //
analyzed: so sor 'brang ma byis pa sun //
translated: the individual protection wards off children,

original: nag po chen pos tshar gcod 'gyur //🔽zhes rgya cher gsungs so //
analyzed: nag po chen pos tshar gcod 'gyur // zhes rgya cher gsungs so //
translated: and the Great Black One destroys.

original: de nas he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa dang bdag med ma'i gzugs ni tshul lam rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas he ru ka phyag bcu drug pa dang bdag med ma'i gzugs ni tshul lam rang bzhin no //
translated: Then, the form of Heruka with sixteen hands and Nairatmya is the method,

original: thabs rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
analyzed: thabs rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
translated: the ocean-like method.

original: de'i @290b phyir tu mpi ste ku ba lta bum yin pa'i gnas yon tan dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i @290b phyir tu mpi ste ku ba lta bum yin pa'i gnas yon tan dang bcas pa'o //
translated: For that purpose, there is the vessel, which is not like a gourd, but a place with good qualities.

original: yang spyod lam gyi dus su yang yon tan dang bcas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang spyod lam gyi dus su yang yon tan dang bcas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Again, in order to show that even at the time of daily activities one should be endowed with good qualities,

original: rkang pa 'khru ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: rkang pa 'khru ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: washing the feet, etc. are easy to understand.

original: brtul zhugs can thabs dang bcas pa'i he ru kar mos pa'o //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can thabs dang bcas pa'i he ru kar mos pa'o //
translated: The one who is disciplined is the one who is devoted to Heruka together with the means.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni shes rab dang bcas pa'i bdag med ma ste longs sku'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni shes rab dang bcas pa'i bdag med ma ste longs sku'o //
translated: The yoginī is Nairātmya together with wisdom, the Enjoyment Body.

original: rnam par bsgom pa ni longs spyod la mos pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par bsgom pa ni longs spyod la mos pa'o //
translated: The one who meditates is the one who is devoted to enjoyment.

original: gzhan pa'i tshul la sogs pa ni snga ma ltar ro //
analyzed: gzhan pa'i tshul la sogs pa ni snga ma ltar ro //
translated: The other modes, etc. are as before.

original: da ni mnyam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni mnyam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to teach the equipoise,

original: bsam gtan ni dbyer med pa dang ldan pa'i rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan ni dbyer med pa dang ldan pa'i rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: concentration is the one-pointedness endowed with the indivisible.

original: nyon mongs pa ni 'jigs pa'i yon tan no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni 'jigs pa'i yon tan no //
translated: Affliction is the fear of good qualities.

original: rdo rje snying po ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje snying po ni bod pa'o //
translated: The vajra essence is the one who is pierced.

original: nga yis bshad ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal gyis bzhes pa'o //
analyzed: nga yis bshad ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal gyis bzhes pa'o //
translated: I explain is the promise of the Bhagavān himself.

original: brtse ba ni sems can don du ste gzhan du'o //
analyzed: brtse ba ni sems can don du ste gzhan du'o //
translated: Love is for the sake of sentient beings, not otherwise.

original: dngos grub don ni bdag don no //
analyzed: dngos grub don ni bdag don no //
translated: The purpose of power is for one’s own benefit.

original: yang bsdu ba ni phyogs gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: yang bsdu ba ni phyogs gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Again, the summary is not elsewhere.

original: zla ba phyed du rtogs ni bsgom pa ste dus myur ba'i tshad do //
analyzed: zla ba phyed du rtogs ni bsgom pa ste dus myur ba'i tshad do //
translated: Meditation for half a month is the measure of quick time.

original: bsam pa thams cad spangs ni nyo tshong dang zhing las la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad spangs ni nyo tshong dang zhing las la sogs pa'o //
translated: Having abandoned all thoughts is [abandoning] buying and selling, farming, and so on.

original: yang na snga ma bzhin te dbyer med pa'i de kho na nyid dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: yang na snga ma bzhin te dbyer med pa'i de kho na nyid dang ldan pas so //
translated: Or else, as before, it is endowed with the reality of non-duality.

original: lha'i gzugs su sems pa ni snga ma ltar phyogs gnyis so //
analyzed: lha'i gzugs su sems pa ni snga ma ltar phyogs gnyis so //
translated: Thinking of the divine form is the two aspects as before.

original: nyi ma gcig tu ma chad pa ni chung du na thun gcig tu yang ngo //
analyzed: nyi ma gcig tu ma chad pa ni chung du na thun gcig tu yang ngo //
translated: Without interruption for one day is even for one watch at the least.

original: sgom pa ni lha'i rnam par gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sgom pa ni lha'i rnam par gsal ba'o //
translated: Meditation is the clarity of the form of the deity.

original: yongs su brtags pa ni gnyis su med pa'i de nyid dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su brtags pa ni gnyis su med pa'i de nyid dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Examination is endowed with the reality of non-duality.

original: de'i phyir ku ba lta bu ma yin zhing dngos grub tu nges par mnyam gzhag gi yon tan no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ku ba lta bu ma yin zhing dngos grub tu nges par mnyam gzhag gi yon tan no //
translated: Therefore, it is not like a gourd, and the quality of equipoise is certain to be accomplished.

original: da ni spyod pa grogs dang ldan pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni spyod pa grogs dang ldan pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the quality of conduct endowed with a friend,

original: rang gzhan don bsgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pas so ;
analyzed: rang gzhan don bsgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pas so ;
translated: [the text says,] “accomplishing the welfare of self and other” is by means of the great seal endowed with the most sublime of all aspects.

original: /'khor ba ni zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ba 'dod chags ma spangs pas so //
analyzed: /'khor ba ni zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ba 'dod chags ma spangs pas so //
translated: “Samsara” is the yogi who has not abandoned passion.

original: thabs gzhan med pa ni nyon thos la sogs pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: thabs gzhan med pa ni nyon thos la sogs pa yin pa'o //
translated: “No other means” are the Sravakas, etc.

original: de'i phyir rig ma goms pa ni bsgom pa'i dus su 'phral du mngon du byed pa 'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir rig ma goms pa ni bsgom pa'i dus su 'phral du mngon du byed pa 'am /
translated: Therefore, the “unfamiliar consort” is one who is not practiced with at the time of meditation, or who is manifested at the time of practice.

original: yid ches ni spyod pa'i dus nyid du yon tan 'byung ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yid ches ni spyod pa'i dus nyid du yon tan 'byung ba bstan pa'o //
translated: “Confidence” is the teaching of the arising of the qualities at the time of practice.

original: de bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste go sla'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste go sla'o //
translated: There is one verse explaining that, which is easy to understand.

original: phan gnod 'bras bu 'byung ba ni 'phrad du nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: phan gnod 'bras bu 'byung ba ni 'phrad du nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: “The result of benefit or harm arises” means that it is experienced immediately.

original: de ltar nges par shes nas ni ma 'ongs par yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nges par shes nas ni ma 'ongs par yang shes par bya'o //
translated: “Having known it thus” means that it should be known in the future.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams skad cig kyang zhes pa ni 'di dag dang gzhan du'o //🔽ji ltar bu 'bod gnas @291a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams skad cig kyang zhes pa ni 'di dag dang gzhan du'o // ji ltar bu 'bod gnas @291a * //
translated: “The yogis, even for a moment” means in this and other lives.

original: su skye ni du 'bod ni mtshon pa ste sdug bsngal can kun du'o //
analyzed: su skye ni du 'bod ni mtshon pa ste sdug bsngal can kun du'o //
translated: “Like a son born in the hell of Wailing” is an illustration of all the sufferings of the hell of Wailing.

original: ji ltar skyes na ni spong ba'i sgra ste mi'i 'gro ba kho na'o //
analyzed: ji ltar skyes na ni spong ba'i sgra ste mi'i 'gro ba kho na'o //
translated: “How is he born?” is the sound of rejection, only in the human realm.

original: da ni spyod pa mthar phyin pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa ni /
analyzed: da ni spyod pa mthar phyin pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, the greatness of the perfection of conduct is taught:🔽The five heinous acts,

original: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // zhes pa ni pha gsod pa dang ma gsod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / dgra bcom pa sun 'byin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /
analyzed: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // zhes pa ni pha gsod pa dang ma gsod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / dgra bcom pa sun 'byin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /
translated: are killing one's father, killing one's mother, killing an arhat, maliciously drawing blood from a tathagata, and causing a schism in the community.

original: srog chags gsod la dga' ba dang zhes pa ni mi dge bcu spyod pa'o //
analyzed: srog chags gsod la dga' ba dang zhes pa ni mi dge bcu spyod pa'o //
translated: And delighting in killing living beings means engaging in the ten nonvirtues.
