analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub phyag rgya chen po sgrub par byed nus pa kho na'o //
translated: The accomplishment of the seal is only the ability to accomplish the great seal.

original: yang spangs gzhan zhes pa ni bdag gzugs bsgyur te gzhan zhes pa ni kakko la las gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: yang spangs gzhan zhes pa ni bdag gzugs bsgyur te gzhan zhes pa ni kakko la las gzhan pa'o //
translated: Again, other than abandoned is the self transformed into the form of Heruka, and other than Kakkola is other than the Kakkola.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs ni he ru ka'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs ni he ru ka'o //
translated: The form of the Bhagavān is Heruka.

original: bstan pa de bshad pa'i phyir lhag ma zhes pa ste bo lla las gzhan pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: bstan pa de bshad pa'i phyir lhag ma zhes pa ste bo lla las gzhan pa'i sku'o //
translated: In order to explain that teaching, the remainder is the body other than the Kakkola.

original: bdag nyid chen po sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams so //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams so //
translated: The great being is the experience of grace, and so on.

original: dga' chen he ru ka'i gzugs ni thabs bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dga' chen he ru ka'i gzugs ni thabs bde ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The form of the great-bliss Heruka is endowed with the method of bliss.

original: he ru ka sbyor ni sku gsung thugs su'o //
analyzed: he ru ka sbyor ni sku gsung thugs su'o //
translated: The union of Heruka is in body, speech, and mind.

original: de nas gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor du 'brel lo //
analyzed: de nas gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor du 'brel lo //
translated: Then, one is connected to the yoga that is able to manifest.

original: shin tu goms pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu goms pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it arises from great familiarity.

original: 'di las ni he ru kar bsgyur ba de las so //
analyzed: 'di las ni he ru kar bsgyur ba de las so //
translated: From this, one transforms into Heruka.

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen por bsgyur nus pa kho na'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen por bsgyur nus pa kho na'o //
translated: The power of the consort is the ability to transform into the great seal.

original: da ni skye ba dag par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni skye ba dag par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the purification of birth,

original: skye dang 'jig pa ni tshogs gnyis sam /
analyzed: skye dang 'jig pa ni tshogs gnyis sam /
translated: birth and destruction are the two accumulations,

original: a'a li k'a li las sam /
analyzed: a'a li k'a li las sam /
translated: or they are from the ālikāli,

original: zla ba nyi ma'am /
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma'am /
translated: or the moon and sun,🔽or the two secret places.

original: byang chub par bskyed pa'am /
analyzed: byang chub par bskyed pa'am /
translated: or generating enlightenment,

original: rjes su chags par zhu ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su chags par zhu ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: or melting through passion, and so on.

original: thabs dang shes rab mi 'ching mi gnod ces pa ni de rnams thabs dang shes rab yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab mi 'ching mi gnod ces pa ni de rnams thabs dang shes rab yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Skillful means and wisdom are not bound and do not harm, because they are skillful means and wisdom.

original: bstan pa de bshad pa'i phyir thabs ni 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba ste /
analyzed: bstan pa de bshad pa'i phyir thabs ni 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba ste /
translated: In order to explain that teaching, “means” is birth,

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / k'a li dang / nyi ma dang / byang chub pa lngas bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / k'a li dang / nyi ma dang / byang chub pa lngas bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: generated by the accumulation of merit, the kālī, the sun, the five enlightenments, and so on.

original: de'i phyir de rnams ni thabs yin pas mya ngan las 'das pa mthar phyin pa ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams ni thabs yin pas mya ngan las 'das pa mthar phyin pa ni lhag ma'o //
translated: Therefore, since those are skillful means, nirvana is the remainder.

original: yang 'jig pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs dang a'a li k'a li dang zla ba dang rjes su chags pas zhu ba la sogs pa kun @293a * //
analyzed: yang 'jig pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs dang a'a li k'a li dang zla ba dang rjes su chags pas zhu ba la sogs pa kun @293a * //
translated: Again, destruction is the accumulation of wisdom, the ālīkāli, the moon, and melting through passion, and so on.

original: nas gang yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: nas gang yang rung ba'o //
translated: Any of them🔽is wisdom.

original: shes rab ni 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin yin pas srid pa mthar byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin yin pas srid pa mthar byed pa'o //
translated: Since that is their nature, it is the end of existence.

original: de dag bsdus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag bsdus pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to include those,

original: de nas zhes pa ni shes rab yin pas na'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni shes rab yin pas na'o //
translated: Then is wisdom.

original: 'di la ni ye shes la sogs pas na'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni ye shes la sogs pas na'o //
translated: Here, it is by means of wisdom and so on.

original: de nyid las ni zhes pa ni bsod nams tshogs la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: de nyid las ni zhes pa ni bsod nams tshogs la sogs pa'o ;
translated: From that itself is the accumulation of merit and so on.

original: / des na zhes pa lhag ma ste thabs yin pas so //
analyzed: / des na zhes pa lhag ma ste thabs yin pas so //
translated: Therefore is the remainder, because it is method.

original: gang la'am la la ni tha mal pa'i tshe na'o //
analyzed: gang la'am la la ni tha mal pa'i tshe na'o //
translated: In regard to someone, at some time, is ordinary.

original: 'jig pas 'jig pa'am zad par 'gyur zhes pa ni zhig nas med par ro //
analyzed: 'jig pas 'jig pa'am zad par 'gyur zhes pa ni zhig nas med par ro //
translated: Destruction is destroyed or exhausted is destroyed and does not exist.

original: 'jig pa'i dngos po ni gdod ma nas shes rab yin pas 'jig pa'i rgyu med pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i dngos po ni gdod ma nas shes rab yin pas 'jig pa'i rgyu med pa'o //
translated: The thing to be destroyed is primordially wisdom, so it is not a cause of destruction.

original: zag pa med pa ni zhig nas zad pa yin pas so //
analyzed: zag pa med pa ni zhig nas zad pa yin pas so //
translated: The undefiled is exhausted after destruction.

original: de bzhin du yang thabs skye ba la yang lhag ma khong nas phyung ste shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang thabs skye ba la yang lhag ma khong nas phyung ste shes par bya ste /
translated: Similarly, the remainder should be extracted from the arising of method and understood.

original: la la skye ba skye bar 'gyur //🔽zhes 'byung ste /
analyzed: la la skye ba skye bar 'gyur // zhes 'byung ste /
translated: Someone arises, arising arises.

original: nyon mongs pa'i skye ba yin pas so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i skye ba yin pas so //
translated: This is because it is the arising of affliction.

original: skye ba'i dngos med zad par 'gyur //
analyzed: skye ba'i dngos med zad par 'gyur //
translated: The nonarising of arising is exhausted.

original: zhes pa thabs dang shes rab kyis skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa thabs dang shes rab kyis skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is the arising of method and wisdom.

original: de dag gis ni bskyed pa'i rim pa thabs kyi cho ga dag par byas nas /
analyzed: de dag gis ni bskyed pa'i rim pa thabs kyi cho ga dag par byas nas /
translated: Having purified the method rite of the creation stage by those,

original: bskyed pa lha'i mtshan ma dag pa'i phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa ni rnal 'byor 'dis las dang po nas bzung ba'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa lha'i mtshan ma dag pa'i phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa ni rnal 'byor 'dis las dang po nas bzung ba'o //
translated: the creation stage is taken up from the beginning of the yoga in order to purify the signs of the created deity.

original: brtul zhugs can ni bskyed rim mthar phyin pa'i bar gyis so //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can ni bskyed rim mthar phyin pa'i bar gyis so //
translated: The one who is devoted is [purified] up to the completion of the creation stage.

original: spros pa ni kha dog dang mtshan ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa ni kha dog dang mtshan ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: Elaboration is color, signs, and so on.

original: bsgom pa ni gsal bar ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni gsal bar ro //
translated: Meditation is clarity.

original: rmi lam ltar gsal ba sems kyi chos yin pas so //
analyzed: rmi lam ltar gsal ba sems kyi chos yin pas so //
translated: Since clarity like a dream is a mental phenomenon,🔽therefore,

original: de'i phyir / spros pa nyid ni spros pa med //
analyzed: de'i phyir / spros pa nyid ni spros pa med //
translated: “Elaboration itself is nonelaboration.”

original: ces bya ste bskyed pa'i ngo bo dag par byed pa'o /
analyzed: ces bya ste bskyed pa'i ngo bo dag par byed pa'o /
translated: Thus, the essence of creation is purified.

original: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yon tan nam spyod yul dag par bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yon tan nam spyod yul dag par bstan pa'i phyir ;
translated: Now, in order to teach the purity of the field or quality of the creation stage,

original: / ji ltar sgyu ma zhes pa ni rig ma la brten pa la sogs pas bde ba sgyu ma lta bu myong ba'o //
analyzed: / ji ltar sgyu ma zhes pa ni rig ma la brten pa la sogs pas bde ba sgyu ma lta bu myong ba'o //
translated: “Like an illusion” is the experience of illusory bliss through reliance on the knowledge consort, and so on.

original: de bzhin rmi lam gsal ba sems kyi chos su'o //
analyzed: de bzhin rmi lam gsal ba sems kyi chos su'o //
translated: Likewise, clarity like a dream is a mental phenomenon.

original: da ni skye ba'i rten dag par bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: da ni skye ba'i rten dag par bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to teach the pure support of birth,

original: ji ltar ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar ni gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: the celestial mansion is just as before.

original: bar srid dam dri za'i grong khyer ni nam mkha' la 'tsho ba'i khang bzangs so //
analyzed: bar srid dam dri za'i grong khyer ni nam mkha' la 'tsho ba'i khang bzangs so //
translated: The intermediate state or gandharva city is the celestial mansion that lives in the sky.

original: rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba ni dag pa dang ldan pas snga ma ltar ro //
analyzed: rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba ni dag pa dang ldan pas snga ma ltar ro //
translated: The application of constant familiarity is as before, endowed with purity.

original: dkyil 'khor nyid kyang de bzhin snang ni bskyed rim de ltar shes nas rdzogs rim la sbyor nus pas so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor nyid kyang de bzhin snang ni bskyed rim de ltar shes nas rdzogs rim la sbyor nus pas so //
translated: The mandala also appears in that way, because if one understands the creation stage in that way, one is able to apply oneself to the completion stage.

original: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the completion stage,

original: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ni @293b kun rdzob phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs phal pa'i padma can la brjod pa ste las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ni @293b kun rdzob phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs phal pa'i padma can la brjod pa ste las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: the empowerment of the great seal is the form of the relative great seal, which is said to be the lotus of the ordinary action seal.

original: dbang bskur ni gsum pa dang 'dra ba las rten khyad par can du nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ni gsum pa dang 'dra ba las rten khyad par can du nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: The empowerment is similar to the third, but the experience is special.

original: ji ltar gzung ba'i bde chen po ni zla ba gzung ba'i man ngag las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gzung ba'i bde chen po ni zla ba gzung ba'i man ngag las skyes pa'o //
translated: The great bliss that is apprehended is produced from the intimate instruction of apprehending the moon.

original: de'i byin rlabs sam mthu ni gsal ba'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: de'i byin rlabs sam mthu ni gsal ba'i bde ba'o //
translated: Its blessing or power is the bliss of clarity.

original: byin rlabs skyes pa las rten dang brten par 'gyur bas dkyil 'khor yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: byin rlabs skyes pa las rten dang brten par 'gyur bas dkyil 'khor yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Since the mandala arises from the arising of the blessing, it is the mandala alone.

original: gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med ni lhan cig skyes las gzhan pa las so //
analyzed: gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med ni lhan cig skyes las gzhan pa las so //
translated: The mandala does not arise from another, that is, from anything other than the innate.

original: de ni gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa'o //
analyzed: de ni gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa'o //
translated: That is the reliance on the wisdom of another’s body.

original: yang phyag rgya chen po ni lte pa la gnas pa'i thig le'am yi ge'o //
analyzed: yang phyag rgya chen po ni lte pa la gnas pa'i thig le'am yi ge'o //
translated: Moreover, the great seal is the drop or syllable located in the navel.

original: dbang bskur ba ni spyi bo'i ham las zhu ba ste gur kum gyi char la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni spyi bo'i ham las zhu ba ste gur kum gyi char la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The empowerment is the melting from the haṃ in the head, accompanied by a rain of saffron powder, and so on.

original: shes pa'i bde chen ni gsal ba'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: shes pa'i bde chen ni gsal ba'i bde ba'o //
translated: The bliss of consciousness is the bliss of clarity.

original: gzhan dag snga ma ltar ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag snga ma ltar ro //
translated: The others are as before.

original: de ni rang lus thabs la brten pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rang lus thabs la brten pa'o //
translated: That is the reliance on the method of one’s own body.

original: gsum pa chags bral gyi dbang bskur ba ste nyams su myong ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gsum pa chags bral gyi dbang bskur ba ste nyams su myong ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: The third is the empowerment of freedom from attachment. The experience is the same as before.

original: yang phyag rgya chen po ni shes rab lha mo bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: yang phyag rgya chen po ni shes rab lha mo bla na med pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the great seal is the unsurpassed goddess of wisdom.

original: dbang bskur ba ni de bsten pa'i thabs chags pa dang chags bral lta bu'i tshul lo //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni de bsten pa'i thabs chags pa dang chags bral lta bu'i tshul lo //
translated: The consecration is the method of relying on that, in the manner of passion and dispassion.

original: shes pa'i bde ba che ni gnyis su med pa'i shes pa 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: shes pa'i bde ba che ni gnyis su med pa'i shes pa 'ba' zhig go //
translated: The great bliss of consciousness is the sole nondual consciousness.

original: byin gyis brlabs ni snang ba byin gyis rlob pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs ni snang ba byin gyis rlob pa'o //
translated: The consecration is the consecration of appearance.

original: gzhan las ni gnyug ma'i dbang po ma smin pa las so //
analyzed: gzhan las ni gnyug ma'i dbang po ma smin pa las so //
translated: From another, from the unripened innate organ.

original: dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med na sgro gsum nus pa med pas rkang pa nyed pa dang dkyil 'khor med pa dang / des mtshon nas phyag rgya dang sngags kyang med pa ste yang dag pa'i brtul zhugs dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni tha tshig go //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med na sgro gsum nus pa med pas rkang pa nyed pa dang dkyil 'khor med pa dang / des mtshon nas phyag rgya dang sngags kyang med pa ste yang dag pa'i brtul zhugs dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni tha tshig go //
translated: If the maṇḍala does not arise, the three vajras are powerless, so the feet are weak, the maṇḍala does not exist, and by that illustration, the mudra and mantra also do not exist.

original: da ni de'i rgyu mtshan rang snang ba'i man ngag bstan pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: da ni de'i rgyu mtshan rang snang ba'i man ngag bstan pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Now, the explanation of the intimate instruction of the appearance of that cause is easy to understand.

original: bde ba gnag cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor mtshon te //
analyzed: bde ba gnag cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor mtshon te //
translated: The black bliss, and so on, illustrates the maṇḍala of the support.

original: bde ba chen po kha dog rnam pa lngas mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po kha dog rnam pa lngas mtshon pa'o //
translated: Great bliss is illustrated by the five colors.

original: yang bsten pa'i dkyil 'khor mtshon te /
analyzed: yang bsten pa'i dkyil 'khor mtshon te /
translated: Moreover, the mandala of the reliance is indicated.

original: nag po ni rdo rje 'chang /
analyzed: nag po ni rdo rje 'chang /
translated: Black indicates Vajradhara.

original: ser po ni rin chen 'byung ldan /
analyzed: ser po ni rin chen 'byung ldan /
translated: Yellow indicates Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: dmar po snang ba mtha' yas /
analyzed: dmar po snang ba mtha' yas /
translated: Red indicates Amitābha.

original: dkar po rnam par snang mdzad /
analyzed: dkar po rnam par snang mdzad /
translated: White indicates Vairocana.

original: ljang gu don yod grub pa //
analyzed: ljang gu don yod grub pa //
translated: Green indicates Amoghasiddhi.

original: sngon po mi bskyod pa mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: sngon po mi bskyod pa mtshon pa'o //
translated: Blue indicates Akṣobhya.

original: de bzhin du rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba la sogs pa thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i bde bas mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba la sogs pa thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i bde bas mtshon pa'o //
translated: In the same way, all moving and unmoving things are indicated by the bliss of the great seal.

original: @294a * // de yang ;
analyzed: @294a * // de yang ;
translated: Moreover,

original: / rdo rje sems dpa' bde //
analyzed: / rdo rje sems dpa' bde //
translated: it is said, “Vajrasattva is blissful.”

original: zhes pa la go bzlog ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la go bzlog ste /
translated: This is reversed.

original: snang ba bde ba chen po nyid du rdo rje sems dpa' brjod do //
analyzed: snang ba bde ba chen po nyid du rdo rje sems dpa' brjod do //
translated: Appearance is said to be Vajrasattva in the nature of great bliss.

original: de nas bde ba chen po la the tshom dri ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas bde ba chen po la the tshom dri ba'i phyir /
translated: Then, in order to ask about the doubts of great bliss,

original: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa /
translated: Vajra Heart said:

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni dbang las thob cing dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i bde chen no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni dbang las thob cing dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i bde chen no //
translated: The yoga of the completion stage is the great bliss of the empowerment and the mandala.

original: satva su kha ste dam pa'am de'i bde ba ni rdzogs rim gyi bde chen no //
analyzed: satva su kha ste dam pa'am de'i bde ba ni rdzogs rim gyi bde chen no //
translated: Sattva sukha is the supreme or the bliss of that, which is the great bliss of the completion stage.

original: de nas bskyed pa yis ni ci zhig 'tshal du 'brel ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de nas bskyed pa yis ni ci zhig 'tshal du 'brel ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Then, what is the need for the creation stage?

original: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no meditation on the perfection stage.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni lan du'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni lan du'o //
translated: The reply of the Bhagavān is “Amazing!”

original: ae ma ni aa ho ste de ltar yin na'ang ngo mtshar ba'o //
analyzed: ae ma ni aa ho ste de ltar yin na'ang ngo mtshar ba'o //
translated: “Amazing” is “aho” in Sanskrit, meaning “if it is so, it is amazing.”

original: byang chub sems dpa'i che ba ni gus pa'i tshul du bod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i che ba ni gus pa'i tshul du bod pa'o //
translated: The greatness of the bodhisattva is stated in the manner of respect.

original: 'di ni zhes pa ni 'di la ste rdzogs rim la'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa ni 'di la ste rdzogs rim la'o //
translated: “In this” is in this perfection stage.

original: dad pa'i shugs kyis nyams pa ni rdzogs rim nyid nyams pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i shugs kyis nyams pa ni rdzogs rim nyid nyams pa'o //
translated: “Corroded by the force of faith” is the corrosion of the perfection stage itself.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na lus kyi dngos med ni bskyed rim gyis rnam pa gsal ba dang bcas pa'i lus so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na lus kyi dngos med ni bskyed rim gyis rnam pa gsal ba dang bcas pa'i lus so //
translated: Why? Because the “nonentity of the body” is the body with clarity of aspect through the creation stage.

original: gang las bde ni lnga pa yin yang bdun pa'i don te /
analyzed: gang las bde ni lnga pa yin yang bdun pa'i don te /
translated: “Bliss” is the fifth, but it has the meaning of the seventh.

original: de nas rten med pa'i phyir brten pa'i bde ba smra bar mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: de nas rten med pa'i phyir brten pa'i bde ba smra bar mi nus pa'o //
translated: Then, because there is no support, it is said that the bliss of the supported cannot be expressed.

original: khyab bya khyab byed tshul ni phan tshun du'o //
analyzed: khyab bya khyab byed tshul ni phan tshun du'o //
translated: The manner of the pervasion is mutual.

original: bde bas 'gro ba khyab ba ni gsum dang gnyis pa yin pas 'gro ba yang bde ba khyab pa nyid do ;
analyzed: bde bas 'gro ba khyab ba ni gsum dang gnyis pa yin pas 'gro ba yang bde ba khyab pa nyid do ;
translated: Since the pervasion of migrators by bliss is the third and second, migrators are pervaded by bliss.

original: / ji ltar ni dpe'o //
analyzed: / ji ltar ni dpe'o //
translated: How is it? It is an example.

original: me tog ni rten no //
analyzed: me tog ni rten no //
translated: A flower is the support.

original: dri ni brten pa'o /
analyzed: dri ni brten pa'o /
translated: Scent is the supported.

original: me tog dngos med ni brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me tog dngos med ni brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the flower is not a thing, it is the support.

original: shes mi 'gyur ni brten pa 'dri mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: shes mi 'gyur ni brten pa 'dri mi shes pa'o //
translated: Scent is not known if the flower is not known.

original: de bzhin ni dpe las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin ni dpe las 'byung ba'o //
translated: Thus is the example.

original: gzugs la sogs pa dngos med ni rten med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dngos med ni rten med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since form and so on are not things, they are not supports.

original: bde ba nyid kyang mi dmigs pa ni rten dmigs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba nyid kyang mi dmigs pa ni rten dmigs zhes pa'o //
translated: Also, since bliss is not observed, it is the support.

original: rdzogs rim la rten med pa ni thabs la bde ba mi 'byung ba bstan nas mi rtog par mi 'byung bar stan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdzogs rim la rten med pa ni thabs la bde ba mi 'byung ba bstan nas mi rtog par mi 'byung bar stan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having explained that bliss does not arise in the method without a support in the completion stage, in order to explain that bliss does not arise without nonconceptuality,

original: dngos po ni skye ba'am chags pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po ni skye ba'am chags pa'o //
translated: a thing is birth or attachment.

original: da ni bdag tu mi dmigs pa'am mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: da ni bdag tu mi dmigs pa'am mi rtog pa'o //
translated: Now, it is not observed as a self or not conceptualized.

original: dngos po med pa bsdu ba'am thim pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa bsdu ba'am thim pa'o //
translated: A nonthing is a collection or dissolution.

original: da ni yang mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: da ni yang mi rtog pa'o //
translated: Now, it is also not conceptualized.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bde ba de dag ni rmi lam ltar rtogs pa'i phyir buddha rtogs pa 'am sangs rgyas yin la /
analyzed: dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bde ba de dag ni rmi lam ltar rtogs pa'i phyir buddha rtogs pa 'am sangs rgyas yin la /
translated: Those who are blissful are buddhas, because of the realization of those entities as like a dream.

original: da ste mi rtog pa rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: da ste mi rtog pa rtogs pa'o //
translated: Now, nonconceptualization is realization.

original: de bzhin du dngos po med par yang lhag ma ste khod nas drang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po med par yang lhag ma ste khod nas drang ngo //
translated: Similarly, nonentities are the remainder, to be drawn out from within.

original: des ni 'di skad 'chad par 'gyur te /🔽bskyed rim dngos po la dngos po @294b med pa brten pa'i bde ba mi 'byung la /
analyzed: des ni 'di skad 'chad par 'gyur te / bskyed rim dngos po la dngos po @294b med pa brten pa'i bde ba mi 'byung la /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: de lhan cig tshol ba'i mi rtog pa dang rtog pa gsal ba yang mi 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de lhan cig tshol ba'i mi rtog pa dang rtog pa gsal ba yang mi 'byung ba'o //
translated: In the creation stage, the bliss that is based on entities does not arise, and the nonconceptualization that is concomitant with that, and the clarity of concepts, also do not arise.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig dam pa su zhig go //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig dam pa su zhig go //
translated: Therefore, who is the best?

original: le los bsnun pa'am bcos ma ni rten gyi chos la dga' ba sems pa'o //
analyzed: le los bsnun pa'am bcos ma ni rten gyi chos la dga' ba sems pa'o //
translated: Who is struck by laziness? Who is the one who delights in the creation stage?

original: rmongs pa ni rten pa'i chos sum shes pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa ni rten pa'i chos sum shes pa'o //
translated: Who is confused? Who does not know the creation stage?

original: da mi shes pa ni rtog pa med pas sangs rgyas ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: da mi shes pa ni rtog pa med pas sangs rgyas ma yin pa'o //
translated: Who is ignorant? Who is not a buddha because of nonconceptuality?

original: de yang skyed pa lha'i rnam pas chog pas lus ci dgos she na /
analyzed: de yang skyed pa lha'i rnam pas chog pas lus ci dgos she na /
translated: Moreover, since the deity’s form is sufficient for the creation stage, what is the use of a body?

original: de'i phyir gnyug ma'i lus bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyug ma'i lus bstan pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the teaching of the innate body is

original: btsun mo bha ga bde chen du //
analyzed: btsun mo bha ga bde chen du //
translated: in the bhaga of the queen, great bliss.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de yang bshad tshul so sor sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de yang bshad tshul so sor sbyar te /
translated: And that is applied to the individual modes of explanation.

original: sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rnams snga ma bzhin byas la /
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rnams snga ma bzhin byas la /
translated: Having performed the preliminary rites as before,

original: ae'i rnam pa'i cha byad ces bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang gi rnam pa dang bcas par bsgom /
analyzed: ae'i rnam pa'i cha byad ces bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang gi rnam pa dang bcas par bsgom /
translated: the form of the aspect of e is the meditation on the form of the celestial mansion of the source of phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog ni rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang ba dang / 'bras bu'i he ru kar gyur pa dang / 'khor bskyed pa dang sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog ni rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang ba dang / 'bras bu'i he ru kar gyur pa dang / 'khor bskyed pa dang sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsgom pa ste /
translated: The jeweled casket of the buddhas is the causal Vajradhara and the resultant Heruka, the creation of the retinue, and the meditation on the triple-being sattva.

original: zam tog ces bya ste rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: zam tog ces bya ste rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The casket is the support and the supported maṇḍala.

original: bde ba can du gnas sam bzhugs //
analyzed: bde ba can du gnas sam bzhugs //
translated: Dwelling or residing in Sukhāvatī

original: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa nas bzlas pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bskyed pa'i rim pa ltar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa nas bzlas pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bskyed pa'i rim pa ltar sbyar ro //
translated: is applied from the invocation of the gnosis wheel up to the recitation, in accordance with the creation stage.

original: yang rdo rje btsun mo ni gzugs dang lang tsho la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: yang rdo rje btsun mo ni gzugs dang lang tsho la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The Vajra Queen is endowed with form, youth, and so forth.

original: bha ga ni bya rog gi gdong can te ye shes kyi skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bha ga ni bya rog gi gdong can te ye shes kyi skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The bhaga is the crow-faced one, because she is endowed with the fortune of wisdom.

original: ae'i rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs ni gsang ba'i gnas kyi spyi'o //
analyzed: ae'i rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs ni gsang ba'i gnas kyi spyi'o //
translated: The form of the aspect of the letter e is the general location of the secret place.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog ni de dang 'brel ba'i thabs kyi gnas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog ni de dang 'brel ba'i thabs kyi gnas so //
translated: The jewel casket of the buddhas is the location of the method connected with that.

original: bde ba can ni zhu ba de'o //
analyzed: bde ba can ni zhu ba de'o //
translated: The Land of Bliss is the melting bliss.

original: rtag tu gnas bzhugs ni gnas pa gnyis dang 'brel lo //
analyzed: rtag tu gnas bzhugs ni gnas pa gnyis dang 'brel lo //
translated: Always abiding is connected with the two abidings.

original: de dag gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gzhan lus shes rab la brten pa'o //
translated: Those are based on the wisdom of another’s body.

original: yang rdo rje btsun mo ni rdo rje lus rtsa'o //
analyzed: yang rdo rje btsun mo ni rdo rje lus rtsa'o //
translated: The Vajra Queen is the vajra body, the nāḍīs.

original: bha ga ni ye shes so //
analyzed: bha ga ni ye shes so //
translated: The bhaga is pristine consciousness.

original: ae'i rnam pa ni skye gnas so //
analyzed: ae'i rnam pa ni skye gnas so //
translated: The form of the letter e is the womb.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen ni bde chen no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen ni bde chen no //
translated: The jewel of the buddhas is great bliss.

original: za ma tog ni snod yin pas za ma tog dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: za ma tog ni snod yin pas za ma tog dang 'dra'o //
translated: The casket is like a casket because it is a vessel.

original: bde ba can ni zhu ba de'o //
analyzed: bde ba can ni zhu ba de'o //
translated: The Land of Bliss is the melting bliss.

original: rtag tu zhugs sam gnas pa ni byon te gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhugs sam gnas pa ni byon te gnas pa'o //
translated: Always abiding or dwelling is arriving and remaining.

original: de ni rang lus thabs la brten pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rang lus thabs la brten pa'o //
translated: That is the reliance on the method of one’s own body.

original: yang rdo rje btsun mo shes rab lha mo bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: yang rdo rje btsun mo shes rab lha mo bla na med pa'o //
translated: Moreover, the vajra queen is the unsurpassed goddess of wisdom.

original: bha gar ni gnas bzang po de dang 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o //🔽ae'i rnam pa ni ma'i dkyil @295a * //
analyzed: bha gar ni gnas bzang po de dang 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o // ae'i rnam pa ni ma'i dkyil @295a * //
translated: The bhaga is the excellent place, and the entry and exit [there].

original: du zug pa'o //
analyzed: du zug pa'o //
translated: The form of e is the penetration into the center of the mother.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen ni nam mkha'i dkyil du zug pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen ni nam mkha'i dkyil du zug pa'o //
translated: The jewel of the buddhas is the penetration into the center of space.

original: za ma tog ni gong dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: za ma tog ni gong dang 'dra'o //
translated: The casket is as above.

original: bde ba can ni gnyug ma'i dbang po zhu ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba can ni gnyug ma'i dbang po zhu ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The Land of Bliss is the melting of the innate faculties.

original: rtag tu zhugs sam gnas pa ni ye shes chen po 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: rtag tu zhugs sam gnas pa ni ye shes chen po 'ba' zhig go //
translated: The constant entry or abiding is only the great wisdom.

original: de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: Those are the great seal of nonduality.

original: de bshad pa'i phyir btsun mo'i bha gar 'brel lo //
analyzed: de bshad pa'i phyir btsun mo'i bha gar 'brel lo //
translated: In order to explain that, [the Bhagavān] connects with the bhaga of the queen.

original: de tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste go sla'o //
analyzed: de tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste go sla'o //
translated: That is one verse, easy to understand.

original: de'i tshe che ba bstan pa ni 'chad pa po nga ni zhu ba ston pa yin pas so //
analyzed: de'i tshe che ba bstan pa ni 'chad pa po nga ni zhu ba ston pa yin pas so //
translated: At that time, the teaching of greatness is that the teacher is me, who teaches the melting.

original: chos nga ni bde ba ston pas so //
analyzed: chos nga ni bde ba ston pas so //
translated: The Dharma is me, who teaches bliss.

original: nyan pa ni rtog pa gsal ba 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: nyan pa ni rtog pa gsal ba 'byung ba'o //
translated: The listener is the arising of clear thought.

original: 'jig rten pa ni lus la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ni lus la gnas pa'o //
translated: The mundane is based on the body.

original: bsgrub bya nga ni sems pa la gnas pa'o //🔽'jig rten nga ni kun rdzob lhan skyes so //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nga ni sems pa la gnas pa'o // 'jig rten nga ni kun rdzob lhan skyes so //
translated: The object of attainment is based on the mind.🔽The mundane is the innate relative.

original: 'jig rten 'das pa nga ni don dam lhan skyes so //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das pa nga ni don dam lhan skyes so //
translated: The supramundane is the innate ultimate.

original: go rims zlog ste nga'i rang bzhin ci zhe na /
analyzed: go rims zlog ste nga'i rang bzhin ci zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of the innate?

original: lhan cig skyes dga' zhes pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga' zhes pa'o //
translated: It is the innate joy.

original: de ji lta shes par bya zhe na ;
analyzed: de ji lta shes par bya zhe na ;
translated: How is that to be known?

original: / mchog dga' dga' bral dang po ni gsum pa'am khyad par te kun rdzob dang don dam mo //
analyzed: / mchog dga' dga' bral dang po ni gsum pa'am khyad par te kun rdzob dang don dam mo //
translated: The supreme joy, the joy of separation, and the first are the three or the special, that is, the relative and the ultimate.

original: de'i dpe yang bdun pa ni go rims dang khyad par ma shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dpe yang bdun pa ni go rims dang khyad par ma shes pa'o //
translated: The example of that is the seventh, which is not knowing the order or the special.

original: mar me ltar ni gsum gyi bar du mtshon pa'am gsum la khyad par mtshon pa'o //🔽de lta mod kyi 'am de bzhin du ni lhan skyes la mtshon du med kyi 'am /
analyzed: mar me ltar ni gsum gyi bar du mtshon pa'am gsum la khyad par mtshon pa'o // de lta mod kyi 'am de bzhin du ni lhan skyes la mtshon du med kyi 'am /
translated: Like a lamp, it is illustrated up to the third, or the special is illustrated in the three.

original: dpe dang mthun par ro /
analyzed: dpe dang mthun par ro /
translated: However, or in the same way, the innate is not illustrated, or it is illustrated in accordance with the example.

original: bu ni rdo rje snying po ste rtogs par 'dod pa kun no //
analyzed: bu ni rdo rje snying po ste rtogs par 'dod pa kun no //
translated: The son is the essence of the vajra, all those who wish to realize.

original: yid ces ni pra ta ya ste /
analyzed: yid ces ni pra ta ya ste /
translated: The mind is pratyaya.

original: rkyen nam mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen nam mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: Condition means the manifestation.

original: da ni de dag sngar gyi dris pa'i lan du bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ni de dag sngar gyi dris pa'i lan du bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Now, in order to summarize those in the answer to the previous question,

original: de med pas ni 'brel te /
analyzed: de med pas ni 'brel te /
translated: it is connected with the absence of that.

original: de med pa'am ma rtogs pa ni lus so //
analyzed: de med pa'am ma rtogs pa ni lus so //
translated: The absence of that or non-realization is the body.

original: bde med 'gyur ni zhu ba de'o //
analyzed: bde med 'gyur ni zhu ba de'o //
translated: The transformation of the absence of bliss is the question.

original: de med na zhu bde med na'o //
analyzed: de med na zhu bde med na'o //
translated: If that does not exist, if bliss does not exist,

original: de yod min ni mi rtog pa gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de yod min ni mi rtog pa gsal ba'o //
translated: that does not exist, the clear non-conceptualization.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nus pa med phyir zhes pa ni kun shes pa'o //
analyzed: nus pa med phyir zhes pa ni kun shes pa'o //
translated: Because of the absence of ability, it is all-knowing.

original: ltos dang bcas ni brten pa dag la'o //
analyzed: ltos dang bcas ni brten pa dag la'o //
translated: It is connected with dependence.

original: 'o na las kyis cho ga mod lha bskyed pa ci dgos she na /
analyzed: 'o na las kyis cho ga mod lha bskyed pa ci dgos she na /
translated: Now, if it is necessary to generate the deity by the rite of karma, what is the use?

original: de'i phyir lha'i rnal 'byor las zhes pa ni lha ru byas pa las so //
analyzed: de'i phyir lha'i rnal 'byor las zhes pa ni lha ru byas pa las so //
translated: Therefore, from the yoga of the deity, it is made into a deity.

original: de nas de nyid du 'brel te de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas de nyid du 'brel te de'i phyir ro //
translated: Then, it is connected with that, because of that.

original: dngos med tshul min lus ltar byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos med tshul min lus ltar byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the non-entity, it is made like the body.

original: de nas bde bar 'brel te de bas sam de'i phyir na sems kyi chos bde ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nas bde bar 'brel te de bas sam de'i phyir na sems kyi chos bde ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Then, it is connected with bliss, because of that, or for that reason, because the mental factor is bliss.

original: sangs rgyas ni rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rtogs pa'o //
translated: Buddha is realization.

original: dngos po @295b min mi bems po'o //
analyzed: dngos po @295b min mi bems po'o //
translated: It is not a thing, nor is it an inert matter.

original: des ni 'di skad bstan to //
analyzed: des ni 'di skad bstan to //
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: lus dang lha dang bde ba mi rtog gsal la dbyer med bstan to //
analyzed: lus dang lha dang bde ba mi rtog gsal la dbyer med bstan to //
translated: The body, deity, and bliss are taught to be non-conceptual, clear, and inseparable.

original: de bstan pa'i phyir zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs ni gzugs tha mal par bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs ni gzugs tha mal par bsgyur ba'o //
translated: In order to teach that, the form with faces and arms is the transformation of ordinary form.

original: de nas lha'i rnam par 'brel te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i rnam par 'brel te /
translated: Then it is connected with the aspect of the deity.

original: de'i gzugs ni ji ltar 'gyur ba'o /
analyzed: de'i gzugs ni ji ltar 'gyur ba'o /
translated: Its form is as it becomes.

original: bzhin lag kha dog ni 'di ltar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bzhin lag kha dog ni 'di ltar gnas pa'o //
translated: The face, hands, and color remain like this.🔽If it is asked, Since it does not need to be generated, is it not a stage of generation?

original: 'o na bskyed mi dgos pas bskyed rim ma yin no zhe na de'i phyir bskyed tsam nyid na zhes bya ba ni lus lhar byas pa tsam mo //
analyzed: 'o na bskyed mi dgos pas bskyed rim ma yin no zhe na de'i phyir bskyed tsam nyid na zhes bya ba ni lus lhar byas pa tsam mo //
translated: The reply is the mere generation is the body made into the deity.

original: yang gnas ni de yang lus rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: yang gnas ni de yang lus rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Then is the stage of the complete body.

original: de nas mchog tu bde bar 'brel te gzugs med pa ni sems so //
analyzed: de nas mchog tu bde bar 'brel te gzugs med pa ni sems so //
translated: Then is connected with supreme bliss. Formless is mind.

original: de'i phyir ni chos nyid bde ba yin pas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir ni chos nyid bde ba yin pas so //
translated: Therefore is the reality of bliss.

original: 'gro kun ni sems can kun no //
analyzed: 'gro kun ni sems can kun no //
translated: All migrating beings are all sentient beings.

original: lhan cig skyes pa ni dbyer med pa'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa ni dbyer med pa'i bde ba'o //
translated: Innately born is inseparable bliss.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod do //
translated: Therefore, it is called the connate nature.

original: rnam dag sems ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rnam dag sems ni dga' ba'o //
translated: The pure mind is joy.

original: rang bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa ni rtog pa ste sangs rgyas kho na'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa ni rtog pa ste sangs rgyas kho na'o //
translated: The nature of nirvana is the realization, which is only the Buddha.

original: des ni 'di skad ston te lus sems lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhan  du bstan to //🔽de'i phyir 'o na kyang zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa de ltar min yang zhes pa'o //
analyzed: des ni 'di skad ston te lus sems lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhan  du bstan to // de'i phyir 'o na kyang zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa de ltar min yang zhes pa'o //
translated: This teaches that the nature of the connateness of body and mind is the realization.

original: bag chags pha la pa ni sprin dang khu rlangs lta bur glo bur du mngon par zhen pa'o /
analyzed: bag chags pha la pa ni sprin dang khu rlangs lta bur glo bur du mngon par zhen pa'o /
translated: Even though it is not like that, as above, the latent tendencies are like clouds and fog, suddenly appearing fixations.

original: da ni spang ba'i tshul nyams su blang ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: da ni spang ba'i tshul nyams su blang ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir ;
translated: Now, in order to teach the method of practice for the way to abandon those,🔽there is one verse on the example of the proliferation of view and signifier.

original: / dug gi dum bu la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis lta ba shes rab kyis spro ba dang mtshan mas spros pa'i dpe ste de yang mu stegs su 'brel /
analyzed: / dug gi dum bu la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis lta ba shes rab kyis spro ba dang mtshan mas spros pa'i dpe ste de yang mu stegs su 'brel /
translated: The example of the poison-tipped arrow, etc., is a verse on the proliferation of view and signifier.

original: de yang rtag chad kyi spros pa dug gi de nyid shes mi gnod la ma shes na gnod pa ste /
analyzed: de yang rtag chad kyi spros pa dug gi de nyid shes mi gnod la ma shes na gnod pa ste /
translated: The proliferation of eternalism and annihilationism is like the poison of a poison-tipped arrow.

original: de'i phyir mu stegs kyis mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mu stegs kyis mi shes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not known by the tīrthikas.

original: ji ltar rlung gis zin pa zhes pa ni dbyer med spyod pas spros pa'i dpe ste /
analyzed: ji ltar rlung gis zin pa zhes pa ni dbyer med spyod pas spros pa'i dpe ste /
translated: As for “seized by wind,” this is an example of the conduct of inseparability.

original: mi gcang ba dang mi dge bas zin pa'o /
analyzed: mi gcang ba dang mi dge bas zin pa'o /
translated: It is seized by impurity and nonvirtue.

original: mon sran ster ba ni mi gtsang ba dang mi dge ba la spyod du 'jug pa ste bzlog pa'i sman gnyen po'i sman yin pas so //
analyzed: mon sran ster ba ni mi gtsang ba dang mi dge ba la spyod du 'jug pa ste bzlog pa'i sman gnyen po'i sman yin pas so //
translated: The gift of beans is the medicine of the antidote that engages in impurity and nonvirtue.

original: rlung gis rlung la bsnun pa ni mi mthun pa la spyod pas mi mthun pa ldog pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gis rlung la bsnun pa ni mi mthun pa la spyod pas mi mthun pa ldog pa'o //
translated: “Wind striking wind” is the reversal of incompatibility through the conduct of incompatibility.

original: de nas sangs rgyas su 'brel te sangs rgyas pa'i nyan thos pa dang rang rgyal gyis mi shes pa'o //🔽rnam rtog las ni zhes pa ni dbyer med 'bras bu spong ba ste de yang rnam rtog spong ba ste /
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas su 'brel te sangs rgyas pa'i nyan thos pa dang rang rgyal gyis mi shes pa'o // rnam rtog las ni zhes pa ni dbyer med 'bras bu spong ba ste de yang rnam rtog spong ba ste /
translated: Then, it is related to buddhahood. It is not known by the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas of the Buddha.🔽“From conceptuality” is the result of the elimination of inseparability.

original: srid pas srid pa dag pa'i phyir ro //🔽rtog pa dang brtags pas mya ngan las 'das @296a * //
analyzed: srid pas srid pa dag pa'i phyir ro // rtog pa dang brtags pas mya ngan las 'das @296a * //
translated: That is also the elimination of conceptuality, because existence purifies existence.🔽Through conceptuality and the conceptual,

original: pa chen po thob pa'o //
analyzed: pa chen po thob pa'o //
translated: the attainment of great nirvāṇa is obtained.

original: ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa 'khor bar zhugs pa'i dpe'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa 'khor bar zhugs pa'i dpe'o //
translated: The example of water entering the ear is the example of entering samsara.

original: chu gzhan gyis dgug pa ni 'khor ba nyid 'bras bur gyur pa'i dpe'o //
analyzed: chu gzhan gyis dgug pa ni 'khor ba nyid 'bras bur gyur pa'i dpe'o //
translated: The example of drawing out the water with another [liquid] is the example of samsara itself becoming the result.

original: de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog ni dpe las byung ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog ni dpe las byung ba ste /
translated: Similarly, the conceptualization of entities arises from the example.

original: brtags pa 'khor ba spang ngo //
analyzed: brtags pa 'khor ba spang ngo //
translated: Imagination is to be abandoned.

original: rnam par nges par spong bar bya ba ni 'bras bu nges par 'gyur ba la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par nges par spong bar bya ba ni 'bras bu nges par 'gyur ba la mkhas pa'o //
translated: The abandonment of ascertainment is the expertise in the ascertainment of the result.

original: yang sangs rgyas su 'brel na ni bskal pa du mar sbyong bas mi shes so //
analyzed: yang sangs rgyas su 'brel na ni bskal pa du mar sbyong bas mi shes so //
translated: Moreover, if one is connected to buddhahood, one does not know through training for many eons.

original: ji ltar mi shes pa ni nyon mongs thams cad sgom pas spong ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar mi shes pa ni nyon mongs thams cad sgom pas spong ba ste /
translated: How does one not know? All afflictions are abandoned through meditation.

original: me yis yang ni gdung ba ste ni rim gyis bsrung ba'i thabs so //
analyzed: me yis yang ni gdung ba ste ni rim gyis bsrung ba'i thabs so //
translated: The burning again by fire is the method of gradual protection.

original: de bzhin 'dod chags ni dpe las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin 'dod chags ni dpe las 'byung ba'o //
translated: Similarly, desire arises from the example.

original: 'dod chags 'dul ba ni rim gyis dal bus zhu ba de chags pa'i cha rtogs pa'i man ngag go //
analyzed: 'dod chags 'dul ba ni rim gyis dal bus zhu ba de chags pa'i cha rtogs pa'i man ngag go //
translated: The taming of desire is the intimate instruction for realizing the aspect of gradual slow melting.

original: sangs rgyas pas mi shes pa ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyis so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pas mi shes pa ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyis so //
translated: The Buddha does not know the Action, Performance, and Yoga Tantras.

original: da ni bsdus te che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni bsdus te che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the greatness of the summary,

original: skye bo mi bzang pa'i las ni bla ma 'phags pa dang 'dra ba'i chos ma thob pas so //
analyzed: skye bo mi bzang pa'i las ni bla ma 'phags pa dang 'dra ba'i chos ma thob pas so //
translated: the bad karma of people is not obtaining the Dharma that is like the noble guru.

original: gang dang gang gi spyir nyon mongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems so //
analyzed: gang dang gang gi spyir nyon mongs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems so //
translated: In whatever general way, the mind is concurrent with afflictions.

original: 'ching 'gyur ni gnod pa'o //
analyzed: 'ching 'gyur ni gnod pa'o //
translated: Binding is harm.

original: thabs ni rjes su brgyad pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: thabs ni rjes su brgyad pa'i tshul lo //
translated: The method is the way of the subsequent eight.

original: de nyid las dang nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid las dang nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: That itself is karma and afflictions.

original: yang na lta ba la sogs pa'i de nyid do //
analyzed: yang na lta ba la sogs pa'i de nyid do //
translated: Or, it is the reality of view and so on.

original: srid pa'i 'ching ba ni 'khor bar skye ba'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'ching ba ni 'khor bar skye ba'i rgyu'o //
translated: The bonds of existence are the cause of birth in samsara.

original: grol ba ni de'i nus pa 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: grol ba ni de'i nus pa 'joms pa'o //
translated: Liberation is the destruction of its power.

original: yang na thabs ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: yang na thabs ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: Or, the method is meditation.

original: bcas pa ni lta ba'o //
analyzed: bcas pa ni lta ba'o //
translated: The injunction is the view.

original: de nyid ni spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni spyod pa'o //
translated: That itself is conduct.

original: srid pa ni 'ching ba las grol ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa ni 'ching ba las grol ba'o //
translated: Existence is liberation from bondage.

original: de dag gis spyir bstan nas sgom pa khyad par du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag gis spyir bstan nas sgom pa khyad par du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having taught in general, in order to teach meditation in particular,

original: chags pa zhes pa ni tha mal pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa zhes pa ni tha mal pa'o //
translated: the attachment is the ordinary one.

original: 'jig rten 'ching ba ni lo ka ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'ching ba ni lo ka ste /
translated: The worldly bondage is the world.

original: phyi ma la gnod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phyi ma la gnod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means harm in the future.

original: 'dod chags nyid rjes su chags pa'i sgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyid rjes su chags pa'i sgom pa'o //
translated: Attachment itself is the meditation of passion.

original: rnam grol ni de kho na nyid la mos pa tsam ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam grol ni de kho na nyid la mos pa tsam ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Liberation is not just the mere faith in reality,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid skye ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid skye ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: but the arising of the innate characteristic.

original: / bzlog pa'i sgom pa nyid ni mtshon pa ste /
analyzed: / bzlog pa'i sgom pa nyid ni mtshon pa ste /
translated: The meditation of the reversal is the illustration.

original: sgom pa dang spyod pa la brjod du zin kyang lta ba dang 'bras bu la yang ngo //
analyzed: sgom pa dang spyod pa la brjod du zin kyang lta ba dang 'bras bu la yang ngo //
translated: Although it is said to be meditation and practice, it is also the view and the result.

original: da ni 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the result, it says:

original: kun du ru las zhes pa ste /
analyzed: kun du ru las zhes pa ste /
translated: From the universal rut.

original: dga' ba chen po gcig nyid ni zhu ba zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba chen po gcig nyid ni zhu ba zhes pa'o //
translated: The single great joy is the melting.

original: tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste go sla'o //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa gcig ste go sla'o //
translated: There is one verse, which is easy to understand.

original: de'i @296b bshad pa yang tshigs su bcad pa lnga ste go sla'o //
analyzed: de'i @296b bshad pa yang tshigs su bcad pa lnga ste go sla'o //
translated: Its explanation is five verses, which are easy to understand.

original: lus lhan cig skyes pa'i 'bras bur bstan nas sems bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lus lhan cig skyes pa'i 'bras bur bstan nas sems bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Having explained the body as the connate result, in order to explain the mind,

original: sems ni chen po nyid ni sngar gyi dga' ba chen po ste /
analyzed: sems ni chen po nyid ni sngar gyi dga' ba chen po ste /
translated: the mind is the great, which is the previous great joy.

original: de nas bde chen mchog tu yang 'brel lo //
analyzed: de nas bde chen mchog tu yang 'brel lo //
translated: Then, it is connected to the supreme great bliss.

original: 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga ni nyon mongs pa'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga ni nyon mongs pa'i gnas skabs so //
translated: The five minds of desire and so on are the state of affliction.

original: dbye ba ni che long du dbye bas so //
analyzed: dbye ba ni che long du dbye bas so //
translated: The divisions are the coarse divisions.

original: lnga ru 'gro ba ni ye shes lngar 'gro ba dang / des rigs lngar yang 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: lnga ru 'gro ba ni ye shes lngar 'gro ba dang / des rigs lngar yang 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The fivefold is the fivefold gnosis, and by that, the five families.

original: de dag cis she na /
analyzed: de dag cis she na /
translated: What are they?

original: de nas lnga'i gzugs su 'brel lo //
analyzed: de nas lnga'i gzugs su 'brel lo //
translated: Then, it is connected to the form of the five.

original: lnga'i gzugs kyis ni 'byung ba lnga'o //
analyzed: lnga'i gzugs kyis ni 'byung ba lnga'o //
translated: The form of the five is the five elements.

original: rnam par mtshon nas brtags ni sems la yang ngo //
analyzed: rnam par mtshon nas brtags ni sems la yang ngo //
translated: Having been designated and imputed, it is also the mind.

original: rigs ni lnga'o //
analyzed: rigs ni lnga'o //
translated: The families are five.

original: de nyid las 'byung ba lnga dang ye shes lnga las gyur pa'o /
analyzed: de nyid las 'byung ba lnga dang ye shes lnga las gyur pa'o /
translated: They arise from that, the five elements and the five gnoses.

original: de dag las dbye ba ni de'i phyir rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'brel lo //
analyzed: de dag las dbye ba ni de'i phyir rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'brel lo //
translated: The divisions from those are the nature, which is connected to the tathāgata family.

original: de las du ma ni rigs rnam pa brgya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de las du ma ni rigs rnam pa brgya zhes pa'o //
translated: From that, the many are the one hundred types of families.

original: da la stong phrag tu ma skyes zhes pa ni de las khrir 'gyur pa ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: da la stong phrag tu ma skyes zhes pa ni de las khrir 'gyur pa ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The phrase not born in thousands means that it is not born in ten thousands. The remainder is clear.

original: de las 'bum phrag rigs chen ni zhes pa'o /
analyzed: de las 'bum phrag rigs chen ni zhes pa'o /
translated: The phrase from that, a hundred thousand great families means that.

original: de la dbye ba'i rigs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la dbye ba'i rigs zhes pa'o //
translated: The phrase from that, a division of families means that.

original: de gzhan dag ni lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de gzhan dag ni lhag ma'o //
translated: The phrase the others are the remainder means that.

original: de las gang g'a klung bcu'i bye ma zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de las gang g'a klung bcu'i bye ma zhes pa'o //
translated: The phrase from that, the sand of ten Ganges means that.

original: de las rigs ni grangs med do zhes pa'o /
analyzed: de las rigs ni grangs med do zhes pa'o /
translated: The phrase from that, an incalculable family means that.

original: de ltar na de kun kyang mchog tu dga' ba ste lhan cig skyes pa nyid dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na de kun kyang mchog tu dga' ba ste lhan cig skyes pa nyid dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Thus, all of that is supreme joy, which is the indivisibility of the innate.

original: rigs las byung ni sgyu'am rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rigs las byung ni sgyu'am rang bzhin no //
translated: The phrase arising from the family means from the transformation or nature.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni rgyud spyi'am he ru ka'o //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje ni rgyud spyi'am he ru ka'o //
translated: The phrase Hevajra means the tantra in general or Heruka.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The phrase dakini means Nairatmya and so on.

original: dra ba ni de dag gis zhus pa'am de dag gi don du gsungs par 'brel ba'o /
analyzed: dra ba ni de dag gis zhus pa'am de dag gi don du gsungs par 'brel ba'o /
translated: The phrase ja'ala means that they requested it or that it was taught for their benefit.

original: sdom pa ni snyoms 'jug gam bde mchog sdom pa'o //
analyzed: sdom pa ni snyoms 'jug gam bde mchog sdom pa'o //
translated: The phrase samaya means union or Cakrasaṃvara.

original: dngos grub gtan la 'bebs pa ni lam gnyis kyis ji ltar mthong ba'am dbyer med phyag rgya chen po gtan la dbab pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub gtan la 'bebs pa ni lam gnyis kyis ji ltar mthong ba'am dbyer med phyag rgya chen po gtan la dbab pa'o //
translated: The ascertainment of spiritual powers is the ascertainment of the great seal, which is the vision or indivisibility by the two paths.

original: brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: brtag pa gnyis pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o /
translated: This concludes the second chapter on the two investigations.

original: // / de nas ni de'i rjes su'o //
analyzed: // / de nas ni de'i rjes su'o //
translated: Then, after that,

original: rdo rje can ni he ru ka'o //
analyzed: rdo rje can ni he ru ka'o //
translated: the one with the vajra is Heruka.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni bdag med ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: The yoginis are Nairatmya and so forth.
